Application.name: ApplBasicBalancingDemo
Application.description: This application demonstrates banancing feature of Audit and Analytics Services

BalancingItem.name: SimpleBalancingTask
BalancingItem.description: This demo explains a simple Rule Procedure that reads data from a csv file and verifies if sum of ACTUAL MTD values matches to the value specified during run time in the rule.
BalancingItem.XMLProcedure:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
                    <procedure autoDownload="false" downloadIntermediate="false" isExtractionRule="false" name="/ApplBasicBalancingDemo/SimpleBalancingTask" policyname="File" primarydsv="CSVDataSource" rpname="SimpleBalancingRP" scriptPath="" type="dsrp" uuid="667fe381-17b962edfd1-514fbff3967d593a46e69850f9a0b3cd" writeToDatabase="false" zipResults="false">
                    <declarations>
                    <parameters>
                    <!-- TOTAL_ACTUAL_MTD AS NUMERIC -->
                    <parameter displayname="TOTAL_ACTUAL_MTD" enabled="yes" id="TOTAL_ACTUAL_MTD" name="TOTAL_ACTUAL_MTD" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    </parameters>
                    <fields>
                    <!-- ACCT_CODE AS NUMERIC -->
                    <field keyfield="yes" level="1" name="ACCT_CODE" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    <!-- ACCT_DESCRIPTION AS STRING -->
                    <field level="1" name="ACCT_DESCRIPTION" type="STRING"/>
                    <!-- PLANNED_MTD AS NUMERIC -->
                    <field level="1" name="PLANNED_MTD" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    <!-- ACTUAL_MTD AS NUMERIC -->
                    <field level="1" name="ACTUAL_MTD" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    <!-- VARIANCE_MTD AS NUMERIC -->
                    <field level="1" name="VARIANCE_MTD" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    <!-- PLANNED_YTD AS NUMERIC -->
                    <field level="1" name="PLANNED_YTD" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    <!-- ACTUAL_YTD AS NUMERIC -->
                    <field level="1" name="ACTUAL_YTD" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    <!-- VARIANCE_YTD AS NUMERIC -->
                    <field level="1" name="VARIANCE_YTD" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    </fields>
                    <variables>
                    <!-- ACTUAL_MTD_SUM AS NUMERIC -->
                    <variable enabled="yes" id="ACTUAL_MTD_SUM" name="ACTUAL_MTD_SUM" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    </variables>
                    <data_sources>
                    <!-- CSVDataSource AS ASCII file -->
                    <data_source dsdname="ASCII files" enabled="yes" id="CSVDataSource" is_auto_download="false" is_input="false" is_output="false" name="CSVDataSource" type="DSV">
                    <definition><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
                    <dataprovider name="">
                    <common>
                    <fields>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="VARIANCE_YTD" order="8" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="ACTUAL_YTD" order="7" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="PLANNED_YTD" order="6" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="VARIANCE_MTD" order="5" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="ACTUAL_MTD" order="4" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="PLANNED_MTD" order="3" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="ACCT_DESCRIPTION" order="2" type="STRING"/>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="1" isvisible="1" name="ACCT_CODE" order="1" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    </fields>
                    </common>
                    </dataprovider>
                    </definition>
                    <definitionphysical><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
                    <dataprovider is_auto_download="false" is_input="false" is_output="false" name="ASCII files">
                    <common>
                    <fields>
                    <field name="VARIANCE_YTD" order="8" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    <field name="ACTUAL_YTD" order="7" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    <field name="PLANNED_YTD" order="6" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    <field name="VARIANCE_MTD" order="5" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    <field name="ACTUAL_MTD" order="4" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    <field name="PLANNED_MTD" order="3" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    <field name="ACCT_DESCRIPTION" order="2" type="STRING"/>
                    <field name="ACCT_CODE" order="1" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    </fields>
                    </common>
                    <specific>
                    <file name="/home/mobius/Samples/Creating_Balancing_Rule_Procedure_using_Web_Rule_Editor/DATA/AC001.csv" overwrite="false"/>
                    <tolerance converting_option="0" log_entry="false" name="" use_err_file="false">
                    <skip_line>#</skip_line>
                    <skip_line>&amp;&amp;</skip_line>
                    </tolerance>
                    <sorted>false</sorted>
                    <operationtype>READ</operationtype>
                    <format delimiter=",(comma)" escape="0" qualifier="{none}" type="Delimited" use_header="true"/>
                    <columns>
                    <column position="8" width="0"/>
                    <column position="7" width="0"/>
                    <column position="6" width="0"/>
                    <column position="5" width="0"/>
                    <column position="4" width="0"/>
                    <column position="3" width="0"/>
                    <column position="2" width="0"/>
                    <column position="1" width="0"/>
                    </columns>
                    </specific>
                    </dataprovider>
                    </definitionphysical>
                    <redaction><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
                    <RedactionRules/>
                    </redaction>
                    <definitioninfo>
                    <dataprovider name="ASCII files">
                    <common>
                    <fields>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="VARIANCE_YTD" order="8" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="ACTUAL_YTD" order="7" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="PLANNED_YTD" order="6" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="VARIANCE_MTD" order="5" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="ACTUAL_MTD" order="4" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="PLANNED_MTD" order="3" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="ACCT_DESCRIPTION" order="2" type="STRING"/>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="1" isvisible="1" name="ACCT_CODE" order="1" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    </fields>
                    </common>
                    </dataprovider>
                    </definitioninfo>
                    </data_source>
                    </data_sources>
                    <options>
                    <!-- DATE_FORMAT  =  M/D/YYYY -->
                    <option displayvalue="M/D/YYYY" name="DATE_FORMAT" value="<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
<format>
<format_type>DATE</format_type>
<pattern>M/D/YYYY</pattern>
<date_order>MDY</date_order>
<date_delimiter>/</date_delimiter>
<four_digit_years>true</four_digit_years>
<lead_zeros_days>false</lead_zeros_days>
</format>
"/>
                    <!-- NUMERIC_FORMAT  =  -#,###.## -->
                    <option displayvalue="-#,###.##" name="NUMERIC_FORMAT" value="<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
<format>
<format_type>NUMERIC</format_type>
<pattern>-#,###.##</pattern>
<digit_grouping>#,###.##</digit_grouping>
<allow_decimal_point>true</allow_decimal_point>
<allow_currency>false</allow_currency>
<currency_symbol>$</currency_symbol>
</format>
"/>
                    <!-- FILE_ENCODING  =  UTF-8 -->
                    <option displayvalue="UTF-8" name="FILE_ENCODING" value="UTF-8"/>
                    <!-- GENLEVEL  =  APPLICATION -->
                    <option displayvalue="APPLICATION" name="GENLEVEL" value="APPLICATION"/>
                    <!-- NO_VALUE  =  ERROR -->
                    <option displayvalue="ERROR" name="NO_VALUE" value="ERROR"/>
                    </options>
                    </declarations>
                    <cases>
                    <!-- ON_START REPORT -->
                    <case id="100098" name="report" type="start">
                    <block/>
                    </case>
                    <!-- ON_EACH RECORD -->
                    <case id="100100" name="record" type="each">
                    <block>
                    <!-- ACTUAL_MTD_SUM = ACTUAL_MTD_SUM+ACTUAL_MTD -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4139217" type="assignment">
                    <var name="ACTUAL_MTD_SUM">ACTUAL_MTD_SUM+ACTUAL_MTD</var>
                    </statement>
                    </block>
                    </case>
                    <!-- ON_END REPORT -->
                    <case id="100099" name="report" type="end">
                    <block>
                    <!-- PRINTLOG  ( "Actual Sum from Sample CSV file: "+ACTUAL_MTD_SUM+"  Expected Total from Parameter: "+TOTAL_ACTUAL_MTD ) -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4139218" type="printlog">
                    <printlog>"Actual Sum from Sample CSV file: "+ACTUAL_MTD_SUM+"  Expected Total from Parameter: "+TOTAL_ACTUAL_MTD</printlog>
                    </statement>
                    <!-- IF ACTUAL_MTD_SUM = TOTAL_ACTUAL_MTD -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4139219" type="condition">
                    <if>ACTUAL_MTD_SUM = TOTAL_ACTUAL_MTD</if>
                    <conditionitems>
                    <conditionitem andor="" comparison="=" lexpression="ACTUAL_MTD_SUM" lparen="" not="" rexpression="TOTAL_ACTUAL_MTD" rparen=""/>
                    </conditionitems>
                    <then>
                    <block>
                    <!-- RETURN SUCCESS , "Balanced" , Approved -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4139220" type="return">
                    <return code="0" error_message=""Balanced"" status="1"/>
                    </statement>
                    </block>
                    </then>
                    <else>
                    <block>
                    <!-- RETURN ERROR , "Not Balanced" , Rejected -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4139221" type="return">
                    <return code="12" error_message=""Not Balanced"" status="2"/>
                    </statement>
                    </block>
                    </else>
                    </statement>
                    </block>
                    </case>
                    </cases>
                    </procedure>

Application.name: ApplBasicReconciliationDemo
Application.description: This application demonstrates reconciliation feature of Audit and Analytics Services

BalancingItem.name: ReconciliationTask
BalancingItem.description: This demo explains a simple Rule Procedure that will append rec02 to rec01 and finally it will reconcile the resultant rec01 against rec03
BalancingItem.XMLProcedure:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
                    <procedure autoDownload="false" name="/ApplBasicReconciliationDemo/ReconciliationTask" rpname="ReconciliationRP" type="rrp" uuid="414eb02f-b0aa-4a0c-9780-5d3163cb877d" zipResults="false">
                    <declarations>
                    <parameters/>
                    <variables>
                    <!-- Matched AS NUMERIC -->
                    <variable enabled="yes" id="Matched" name="Matched" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    <!-- NotMatched AS NUMERIC -->
                    <variable enabled="yes" id="NotMatched" name="NotMatched" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    </variables>
                    <data_sources>
                    <!-- Rec1 AS ASCII file -->
                    <data_source dsdname="ASCII files" enabled="yes" id="10582" is_auto_download="false" is_input="false" is_output="false" name="Rec1" type="DSV">
                    <definition><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
                    <dataprovider name="">
                    <common>
                    <fields>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="ACTUAL_MTD" order="2" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="1" isvisible="1" name="ACCOUNT_CODE" order="1" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    </fields>
                    </common>
                    </dataprovider>
                    </definition>
                    <definitionphysical><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
                    <dataprovider is_auto_download="false" is_input="false" is_output="false" name="ASCII files">
                    <common>
                    <fields>
                    <field name="ACTUAL_MTD" order="2" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    <field name="ACCOUNT_CODE" order="1" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    </fields>
                    </common>
                    <specific>
                    <file name="/home/mobius/Samples/Creating_Reconciliation_Rule_Procedure_using_Web_Rule_Editor/DATA/rec01.txt" overwrite="false"/>
                    <tolerance converting_option="0" log_entry="false" name="" use_err_file="false">
                    <skip_line>#</skip_line>
                    <skip_line>&amp;&amp;</skip_line>
                    </tolerance>
                    <sorted>false</sorted>
                    <operationtype>READ</operationtype>
                    <format delimiter="{tab}" escape="0" qualifier="{none}" type="Delimited" use_header="false"/>
                    <columns>
                    <column position="2" width="0"/>
                    <column position="1" width="0"/>
                    </columns>
                    </specific>
                    </dataprovider>
                    </definitionphysical>
                    <preprocessing><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
                    <DFPR/>
                    </preprocessing>
                    <redaction><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
                    <RedactionRules/>
                    </redaction>
                    <definitioninfo>
                    <dataprovider name="ASCII files">
                    <common>
                    <fields>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="ACTUAL_MTD" order="2" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="1" isvisible="1" name="ACCOUNT_CODE" order="1" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    </fields>
                    </common>
                    </dataprovider>
                    </definitioninfo>
                    </data_source>
                    <!-- Rec2 AS ASCII file -->
                    <data_source dsdname="ASCII files" enabled="yes" id="933" is_auto_download="false" is_input="false" is_output="false" name="Rec2" type="DSV">
                    <definition><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
                    <dataprovider name="">
                    <common>
                    <fields>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="ACTUAL_MTD" order="2" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="1" isvisible="1" name="ACCOUNT_CODE" order="1" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    </fields>
                    </common>
                    </dataprovider>
                    </definition>
                    <definitionphysical><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
                    <dataprovider is_auto_download="false" is_input="false" is_output="false" name="ASCII files">
                    <common>
                    <fields>
                    <field name="ACTUAL_MTD" order="2" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    <field name="ACCOUNT_CODE" order="1" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    </fields>
                    </common>
                    <specific>
                    <file name="/home/mobius/Samples/Creating_Reconciliation_Rule_Procedure_using_Web_Rule_Editor/DATA/rec02.txt" overwrite="false"/>
                    <tolerance converting_option="0" log_entry="false" name="" use_err_file="false">
                    <skip_line>#</skip_line>
                    <skip_line>&amp;&amp;</skip_line>
                    </tolerance>
                    <sorted>false</sorted>
                    <operationtype>READ</operationtype>
                    <format delimiter="{tab}" escape="0" qualifier="{none}" type="Delimited" use_header="false"/>
                    <columns>
                    <column position="2" width="0"/>
                    <column position="1" width="0"/>
                    </columns>
                    </specific>
                    </dataprovider>
                    </definitionphysical>
                    <preprocessing><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
                    <DFPR/>
                    </preprocessing>
                    <redaction><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
                    <RedactionRules/>
                    </redaction>
                    <definitioninfo>
                    <dataprovider name="ASCII files">
                    <common>
                    <fields>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="ACTUAL_MTD" order="2" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="1" isvisible="1" name="ACCOUNT_CODE" order="1" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    </fields>
                    </common>
                    </dataprovider>
                    </definitioninfo>
                    </data_source>
                    <!-- Rec3 AS ASCII file -->
                    <data_source dsdname="ASCII files" enabled="yes" id="7167" is_auto_download="false" is_input="false" is_output="false" name="Rec3" type="DSV">
                    <definition><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
                    <dataprovider name="">
                    <common>
                    <fields>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="ACTUAL_MTD" order="2" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="1" isvisible="1" name="ACCOUNT_CODE" order="1" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    </fields>
                    </common>
                    </dataprovider>
                    </definition>
                    <definitionphysical><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
                    <dataprovider is_auto_download="false" is_input="false" is_output="false" name="ASCII files">
                    <common>
                    <fields>
                    <field name="ACTUAL_MTD" order="2" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    <field name="ACCOUNT_CODE" order="1" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    </fields>
                    </common>
                    <specific>
                    <file name="/home/mobius/Samples/Creating_Reconciliation_Rule_Procedure_using_Web_Rule_Editor/DATA/rec03.txt" overwrite="false"/>
                    <tolerance converting_option="0" log_entry="false" name="" use_err_file="false">
                    <skip_line>#</skip_line>
                    <skip_line>&amp;&amp;</skip_line>
                    </tolerance>
                    <sorted>false</sorted>
                    <operationtype>READ</operationtype>
                    <format delimiter="{tab}" escape="0" qualifier="{none}" type="Delimited" use_header="false"/>
                    <columns>
                    <column position="2" width="0"/>
                    <column position="1" width="0"/>
                    </columns>
                    </specific>
                    </dataprovider>
                    </definitionphysical>
                    <preprocessing><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
                    <DFPR/>
                    </preprocessing>
                    <redaction><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
                    <RedactionRules/>
                    </redaction>
                    <definitioninfo>
                    <dataprovider name="ASCII files">
                    <common>
                    <fields>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="ACTUAL_MTD" order="2" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="1" isvisible="1" name="ACCOUNT_CODE" order="1" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    </fields>
                    </common>
                    </dataprovider>
                    </definitioninfo>
                    </data_source>
                    </data_sources>
                    <options>
                    <!-- DATE_FORMAT  =  M/D/YYYY -->
                    <option displayvalue="M/D/YYYY" name="DATE_FORMAT" value="<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
<format>
<format_type>DATE</format_type>
<pattern>M/D/YYYY</pattern>
<date_order>MDY</date_order>
<date_delimiter>/</date_delimiter>
<four_digit_years>true</four_digit_years>
<lead_zeros_days>false</lead_zeros_days>
</format>
"/>
                    <!-- NUMERIC_FORMAT  =  -#,###.## -->
                    <option displayvalue="-#,###.##" name="NUMERIC_FORMAT" value="<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
<format>
<format_type>NUMERIC</format_type>
<pattern>-#,###.##</pattern>
<digit_grouping>#,###.##</digit_grouping>
<allow_decimal_point>true</allow_decimal_point>
<allow_currency>false</allow_currency>
<currency_symbol>$</currency_symbol>
</format>
"/>
                    <!-- FILE_ENCODING  =  UTF-8 -->
                    <option displayvalue="UTF-8" name="FILE_ENCODING" value="UTF-8"/>
                    <!-- GENLEVEL  =  APPLICATION -->
                    <option displayvalue="APPLICATION" name="GENLEVEL" value="APPLICATION"/>
                    <!-- NO_VALUE  =  ERROR -->
                    <option displayvalue="ERROR" name="NO_VALUE" value="ERROR"/>
                    </options>
                    </declarations>
                    <cases>
                    <!-- ON_START -->
                    <case id="100135" name="rrp" type="start">
                    <block>
                    <!-- Rec1  =  APPEND Rec1 ,  Rec2 -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4139482" type="append" usedatabase="no">
                    <target name="Rec1"/>
                    <dsvitem dsvname="Rec1"/>
                    <dsvitem dsvname="Rec2"/>
                    </statement>
                    <!-- Rec1  =  FILTER Rec1 ( ACCOUNT_CODE, ACTUAL_MTD ) , Rec1.ACCOUNT_CODE >= "1" -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4139483" type="filter" usedatabase="no">
                    <target name="Rec1"/>
                    <dsvitem dsvname="Rec1">
                    <dsvfield name="ACCOUNT_CODE"/>
                    <dsvfield name="ACTUAL_MTD"/>
                    </dsvitem>
                    <expression>Rec1.ACCOUNT_CODE >= "1"</expression>
                    <conditionitems>
                    <conditionitem andor="" comparison=">=" lexpression="Rec1.ACCOUNT_CODE" lparen="" not="" rexpression=""1"" rparen=""/>
                    </conditionitems>
                    </statement>
                    <!-- Rec1  =  ELIMINATE Rec1 -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4139484" type="eliminate" usedatabase="no">
                    <target name="Rec1"/>
                    <dsvitem dsvname="Rec1"/>
                    </statement>
                    <!-- Rec3  =  AGGREGATE Rec3 -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4139485" type="aggregate" usedatabase="no">
                    <target name="Rec3"/>
                    <dsvitem dsvname="Rec3"/>
                    </statement>
                    </block>
                    </case>
                    <!-- RECONCILE Rec1 ( ACCOUNT_CODE ) ,  Rec3 ( ACCOUNT_CODE ) -->
                    <case id="100136" name="rrp" sparkreconcile="false" type="reconcile">
                    <reconcileitems>
                    <dsvitem dsvname="Rec1">
                    <dsvfield name="ACCOUNT_CODE"/>
                    </dsvitem>
                    <dsvitem dsvname="Rec3">
                    <dsvfield name="ACCOUNT_CODE"/>
                    </dsvitem>
                    </reconcileitems>
                    <block/>
                    <case id="100139" name="reconcile_field" type="start">
                    <block/>
                    </case>
                    <case id="100137" name="matched" type="reconcile">
                    <block>
                    <!-- IF Rec1.ACTUAL_MTD = Rec3.ACTUAL_MTD -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="16423" type="condition">
                    <if>Rec1.ACTUAL_MTD = Rec3.ACTUAL_MTD</if>
                    <conditionitems>
                    <conditionitem andor="" comparison="=" lexpression="Rec1.ACTUAL_MTD" lparen="" not="" rexpression="Rec3.ACTUAL_MTD" rparen=""/>
                    </conditionitems>
                    <then>
                    <block>
                    <!-- Matched = Matched + 1 -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="7227" type="assignment">
                    <var name="Matched">Matched + 1</var>
                    </statement>
                    </block>
                    </then>
                    <else>
                    <block>
                    <!-- NotMatched = NotMatched + 1 -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="16931" type="assignment">
                    <var name="NotMatched">NotMatched + 1</var>
                    </statement>
                    </block>
                    </else>
                    </statement>
                    </block>
                    </case>
                    <case id="100138" name="notmatched" type="reconcile">
                    <block>
                    <!-- NotMatched = NotMatched  + 1 -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="11321" type="assignment">
                    <var name="NotMatched">NotMatched  + 1</var>
                    </statement>
                    </block>
                    </case>
                    <case id="100140" name="reconcile_field" type="end">
                    <block/>
                    </case>
                    </case>
                    <!-- ON_END -->
                    <case id="100141" name="rrp" type="end">
                    <block>
                    <!-- PRINTLOG  ( "TOTAL ==> MATCHED:  "+Matched+"  NOT MATCHED:  "+NotMatched ) -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4139486" type="printlog">
                    <printlog>"TOTAL ==> MATCHED:  "+Matched+"  NOT MATCHED:  "+NotMatched</printlog>
                    </statement>
                    <!-- IF NotMatched = 0 -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4139487" type="condition">
                    <if>NotMatched = 0</if>
                    <conditionitems>
                    <conditionitem andor="" comparison="=" lexpression="NotMatched" lparen="" not="" rexpression="0" rparen=""/>
                    </conditionitems>
                    <then>
                    <block>
                    <!-- RETURN SUCCESS , "BALANCED" , Approved -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4139488" type="return">
                    <return code="0" error_message=""BALANCED"" status="1"/>
                    </statement>
                    </block>
                    </then>
                    <else>
                    <block>
                    <!-- RETURN ERROR , "NOT BALANCED" , Rejected -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4139489" type="return">
                    <return code="12" error_message=""NOT BALANCED"" status="2"/>
                    </statement>
                    </block>
                    </else>
                    </statement>
                    </block>
                    </case>
                    </cases>
                    </procedure>

Application.name: ApplExtractionDemo

BalancingItem.name: ExtractionTask
BalancingItem.description: This demo explains a simple Extraction Rule Procedure that extracts data from the Mobius content repository.

<format>

"/>
                        <!-- NUMERIC_FORMAT  =  -#,###.## -->

"/>

                        <cases>
                        <!-- ON_START REPORT -->

                        <var name="outputFormatTemp">outputFormat</var>
                        </statement>
                        <!-- MobiusViewDS = versionextractionPolicy report section -->
                        <statement enabled="yes" id="8718" type="dsvinit">
                        <target directionforward="yes" esav="yes" exclude_header="false" fieldgroup="fieldGroup" filenameoption="0" filter="filter" intervaltype="4" name="MobiusViewDS" novalexception="no" outputformat=""CSV"" pagerange="PageRange" policyname="extractionPolicy" relativeinterval="0" reportid="report" reportsection="section" roottag="" rowtag="" sectionname="" sparkfile="" startfromintervaltype="4" startfromrelativeinterval="0" startfromversion="" startfromversionmode="0" stopafterinterval="0" stopafterintervaltype="4" vdr="yes" versionmode="0">version</target>
                        <esavitem/>
                        <conditionitems/>
                        </statement>
                        <!-- tempFile = "tempFile"+System.currentTimeMillis()+".csv" , NO_VALUE = ERROR , XSL = -->
                        <statement enabled="yes" id="974" type="dsvinit">
                        <target filenameoption="0" intervaltype="4" name="tempFile" novalexception="no" policyname="" relativeinterval="0" reportid="" roottag="" rowtag="" sparkfile="" versionmode="0">"tempFile"+System.currentTimeMillis()+".csv"</target>
                        <esavitem/>
                        <retrieveoptions>
                        <retrieveoption name="NO_VALUE" value="ERROR"/>
                        </retrieveoptions>
                        </statement>
                        <!-- SAVE MobiusViewDS IN tempFile OVERWRITE -->
                        <statement enabled="yes" id="13189" type="save" usedatabase="no">
                        <target name="tempFile"/>
                        <dsvitem dsvname="MobiusViewDS"/>
                        <overwrite value="yes"/>
                        </statement>
                        <!-- isMvCSV = 1 -->
                        <statement enabled="yes" id="17971" type="assignment">
                        <var name="isMvCSV">1</var>
                        </statement>
                        <!-- outputFormatSplit = FOREACH TOKENIZER ( outputFormatTemp , pattern:"(.+?)(?:,|$)" ) -->
                        <statement active_entity="eTokenizer" enabled="yes" id="13003" type="foreach">
                        <tokenizer delimiter="" is_include="false" is_pattern="true" is_replacement="false" is_use_regexp_delimiter="false" is_use_regexp_pattern="true" pattern=""(.+?)(?:,|$)"" replacement="" source_var="outputFormatTemp" targe_vart="outputFormatSplit"/>
                        <array/>
                        <block>
                        <!-- outputFormatSplit = TRIM (outputFormatSplit) -->
                        <statement enabled="yes" id="19228" type="assignment">
                        <var name="outputFormatSplit">TRIM (outputFormatSplit)</var>
                        </statement>
                        <!-- outputFormatSplit = TRIM (outputFormatSplit , ',' ) -->
                        <statement enabled="yes" id="13967" type="assignment">
                        <var name="outputFormatSplit">TRIM (outputFormatSplit , ',' )</var>
                        </statement>
                        <!-- IF outputFormatSplit = "TEXT" -->
                        <statement enabled="yes" id="12761" type="condition">
                        <if>outputFormatSplit = "TEXT"</if>
                        <conditionitems>
                        <conditionitem andor="" comparison="=" lexpression="outputFormatSplit" lparen="" not="" rexpression=""TEXT"" rparen=""/>
                        </conditionitems>
                        <then>
                        <block>
                        <!-- outputFilePath = FILENAME(TextOutputDS) -->
                        <statement enabled="yes" id="8393" type="assignment">
                        <var name="outputFilePath">FILENAME(TextOutputDS)</var>
                        </statement>
                        <!-- MobiusViewDS = versionextractionPolicy report section -->
                        <statement enabled="yes" id="8782" type="dsvinit">
                        <target directionforward="yes" esav="yes" exclude_header="false" fieldgroup="fieldGroup" filenameoption="0" filter="filter" intervaltype="4" name="MobiusViewDS" novalexception="no" outputformat="outputFormatSplit" pagerange="PageRange" policyname="extractionPolicy" relativeinterval="0" reportid="report" reportsection="section" roottag="" rowtag="" sectionname="" sparkfile="" startfromintervaltype="4" startfromrelativeinterval="0" startfromversion="" startfromversionmode="0" stopafterinterval="0" stopafterintervaltype="4" vdr="yes" versionmode="0">version</target>
                        <esavitem/>
                        <conditionitems/>
                        </statement>
                        <!-- TextOutputDS = outputFilePath+""+System.currentTimeMillis()+".text" , NO_VALUE = ERROR , XSL = -->
                        <statement enabled="yes" id="12404" type="dsvinit">
                        <target filenameoption="0" intervaltype="4" name="TextOutputDS" novalexception="no" policyname="" relativeinterval="0" reportid="" roottag="" rowtag="" sparkfile="" versionmode="0">outputFilePath+""+System.currentTimeMillis()+".text"</target>
                        <esavitem/>

                        </retrieveoptions>
                        </statement>
                        <!-- SAVE MobiusViewDS IN TextOutputDS OVERWRITE -->

                        <target name="TextOutputDS"/>
                        <dsvitem dsvname="MobiusViewDS"/>
                        <overwrite value="yes"/>
                        </statement>
                        <!-- isMvCSV = 0 -->
                        <statement enabled="yes" id="7183" type="assignment">
                        <var name="isMvCSV">0</var>
                        </statement>
                        </block>
                        </then>
                        <else>
                        <block>
                        <!-- IF outputFormatSplit = "CSV" -->
                        <statement enabled="yes" id="3267" type="condition">

                        <conditionitems>
                        <conditionitem andor="" comparison="=" lexpression="outputFormatSplit" lparen="" not="" rexpression=""CSV"" rparen=""/>
                        </conditionitems>

                        <conditionitem andor="" comparison="=" lexpression="isMvCSV" lparen="" not="" rexpression="0" rparen=""/>
                        </conditionitems>
                        <then>
                        <block>
                        <!-- MobiusViewDS = versionextractionPolicy report section -->

                        <target directionforward="yes" esav="yes" exclude_header="false" fieldgroup="fieldGroup" filenameoption="0" filter="filter" intervaltype="4" name="MobiusViewDS" novalexception="no" outputformat="outputFormat" pagerange="PageRange" policyname="extractionPolicy" relativeinterval="0" reportid="report" reportsection="section" roottag="" rowtag="" sectionname="" sparkfile="" startfromintervaltype="4" startfromrelativeinterval="0" startfromversion="" startfromversionmode="0" stopafterinterval="0" stopafterintervaltype="4" vdr="yes" versionmode="0">version</target>
                        <esavitem/>

                        </statement>

                        <retrieveoption name="NO_VALUE" value="ERROR"/>

                        </statement>

                        </statement>

                        </then>

                        <block>

                        <then>
                        <block>
                        <!-- outputFilePath = FILENAME(ExcelOutputDS) -->
                        <statement enabled="yes" id="8460" type="assignment">
                        <var name="outputFilePath">FILENAME(ExcelOutputDS)</var>
                        </statement>
                        <!-- ExcelOutputDS = outputFilePath+""+System.currentTimeMillis()+".xlsx" , NO_VALUE = ERROR , XSL = -->
                        <statement enabled="yes" id="2150" type="dsvinit">
                        <target filenameoption="0" intervaltype="4" name="ExcelOutputDS" novalexception="no" policyname="" relativeinterval="0" reportid="" roottag="" rowtag="" sparkfile="" versionmode="0">outputFilePath+""+System.currentTimeMillis()+".xlsx"</target>
                        <esavitem/>
                        <retrieveoptions>
                        <retrieveoption name="NO_VALUE" value="ERROR"/>
                        </retrieveoptions>
                        </statement>
                        <!-- outputFilePath = FILENAME(ExcelOutputDS) -->
                        <statement enabled="yes" id="11849" type="assignment">
                        <var name="outputFilePath">FILENAME(ExcelOutputDS)</var>
                        </statement>
                        <!-- tempExtractionFileName = FILENAME(tempFile) -->
                        <statement enabled="yes" id="18290" type="assignment">
                        <var name="tempExtractionFileName">FILENAME(tempFile)</var>
                        </statement>
                        <!-- isConversionCompleted = CONVERT_CSV_TO_EXCEL (tempExtractionFileName,outputFilePath,MobiusViewDS) -->
                        <statement enabled="yes" id="1967" type="assignment">
                        <var name="isConversionCompleted">CONVERT_CSV_TO_EXCEL (tempExtractionFileName,outputFilePath,MobiusViewDS)</var>
                        </statement>
                        </block>
                        </then>
                        <else>
                        <block>
                        <!-- IF outputFormatSplit = "ACCESS_DB" -->
                        <statement enabled="yes" id="626" type="condition">
                        <if>outputFormatSplit = "ACCESS_DB"</if>
                        <conditionitems>
                        <conditionitem andor="" comparison="=" lexpression="outputFormatSplit" lparen="" not="" rexpression=""ACCESS_DB"" rparen=""/>
                        </conditionitems>
                        <then>
                        <block>
                        <!-- outputFilePath = FILENAME(ACCDBOutputDS) -->
                        <statement enabled="yes" id="18432" type="assignment">
                        <var name="outputFilePath">FILENAME(ACCDBOutputDS)</var>
                        </statement>
                        <!-- ACCDBOutputDS = outputFilePath+""+System.currentTimeMillis()+".accdb" , NO_VALUE = ERROR , XSL = -->
                        <statement enabled="yes" id="17931" type="dsvinit">
                        <target filenameoption="0" intervaltype="4" name="ACCDBOutputDS" novalexception="no" policyname="" relativeinterval="0" reportid="" roottag="" rowtag="" sparkfile="" versionmode="0">outputFilePath+""+System.currentTimeMillis()+".accdb"</target>
                        <esavitem/>
                        <retrieveoptions>
                        <retrieveoption name="NO_VALUE" value="ERROR"/>
                        </retrieveoptions>
                        </statement>
                        <!-- outputFilePath = FILENAME(ACCDBOutputDS) -->
                        <statement enabled="yes" id="3344" type="assignment">
                        <var name="outputFilePath">FILENAME(ACCDBOutputDS)</var>
                        </statement>
                        <!-- tempExtractionFileName = FILENAME(tempFile) -->
                        <statement enabled="yes" id="6615" type="assignment">
                        <var name="tempExtractionFileName">FILENAME(tempFile)</var>
                        </statement>
                        <!-- isConversionCompleted = CONVERT_CSV_TO_ACCESS_DB(tempExtractionFileName,outputFilePath,MobiusViewDS) -->
                        <statement enabled="yes" id="3515" type="assignment">
                        <var name="isConversionCompleted">CONVERT_CSV_TO_ACCESS_DB(tempExtractionFileName,outputFilePath,MobiusViewDS)</var>
                        </statement>
                        </block>
                        </then>
                        <else/>
                        </statement>
                        </block>
                        </else>
                        </statement>
                        </block>
                        </else>
                        </statement>
                        </block>
                        </else>
                        </statement>
                        </block>
                        </statement>
                        </block>
                        </case>
                        <!-- ON_EACH RECORD -->
                        <case id="100021" name="record" type="each">
                        <block/>
                        </case>
                        <!-- ON_END REPORT -->
                        <case id="100020" name="report" type="end">
                        <block>
                        <!-- ON ERROR -->
                        <statement enabled="yes" id="618" type="onerror">
                        <block>
                        <!-- IF ERROR = 6002 -->
                        <statement enabled="yes" id="11730" type="condition">
                        <if>ERROR = 6002</if>
                        <conditionitems>
                        <conditionitem andor="" comparison="=" lexpression="ERROR" lparen="" not="" rexpression="6002" rparen=""/>
                        </conditionitems>
                        <then>
                        <block>
                        <!-- RETURN WARNING , "The Run was successful however, the output may only contain partial data since the number of rows exceed Excel supported limit." -->
                        <statement enabled="yes" id="18345" type="return">
                        <return code="4" error_message=""The Run was successful however, the output may only contain partial data since the number of rows exceed Excel supported limit."" status="-1"/>
                        </statement>
                        </block>
                        </then>
                        <else>
                        <block>
                        <!-- RETURN ERROR , "Run Failed" -->
                        <statement enabled="yes" id="16812" type="return">
                        <return code="12" error_message=""Run Failed"" status="-1"/>
                        </statement>
                        </block>
                        </else>
                        </statement>
                        </block>
                        </statement>
                        <!-- RETURN SUCCESS , "Run completed." , Approved -->
                        <statement enabled="yes" id="3705" type="return">
                        <return code="0" error_message=""Run completed."" status="1"/>
                        </statement>
                        </block>
                        </case>
                        </cases>
                        </procedure>

Application.name: LocateDBValueByKey
Application.description: This application demonstrates LOCATE command of Audit and Analytics Services

BalancingItem.name: LocateTask
BalancingItem.description:
This demo explains a simple Rule Procedure that identifies a set of records based on key values from Data Source types which are available for reading from database.
The LOCATE command simplifies search in Internal/External database, where we can search based on key field(s) and fetch all the fields matching the search criteria.
BalancingItem.XMLProcedure:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
                    <procedure autoDownload="false" downloadIntermediate="false" name="/LocateDBValueByKey/LocateTask" policyname="Database read" primarydsv="AC001keys" rpname="RpLocateTest" scriptPath="null" type="dsrp" uuid="6009bea-16eacaee6b7-00ef7662b53dc0f0afa8e8adbe1fdfa3" writeToDatabase="false" zipResults="false">
                    <declarations>
                    <parameters/>
                    <fields>
                    <!-- ACCOUNT AS STRING -->
                    <field level="1" name="ACCOUNT" type="STRING"/>
                    <!-- COUNTRY AS STRING -->
                    <field level="1" name="COUNTRY" type="STRING"/>
                    <!-- REGION AS STRING -->
                    <field level="1" name="REGION" type="STRING"/>
                    <!-- STATE AS STRING -->
                    <field level="1" name="STATE" type="STRING"/>
                    </fields>
                    <variables>
                    <!-- AmountNUM AS NUMERIC -->
                    <variable enabled="yes" name="AmountNUM" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    <!-- AmountNUMarray AS NUMERIC_ARRAY -->
                    <variable enabled="yes" name="AmountNUMarray" type="NUMERIC_ARRAY"/>
                    <!-- nArray AS NUMERIC -->
                    <variable enabled="yes" name="nArray" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    </variables>
                    <data_sources>
                    <!-- AC001values AS Database - READ -->
                    <data_source dsdname="Database - READ" enabled="yes" is_auto_download="false" is_input="false" is_output="false" name="AC001values" type="DSV">
                    <definition><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
                    <dataprovider name="">
                    <common>
                    <fields>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="AMOUNT" order="5" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="1" isvisible="1" name="STATE" order="4" type="STRING"/>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="1" isvisible="1" name="REGION" order="3" type="STRING"/>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="1" isvisible="1" name="COUNTRY" order="2" type="STRING"/>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="1" isvisible="1" name="ACCOUNT" order="1" type="STRING"/>
                    </fields>
                    </common>
                    </dataprovider>
                    </definition>
                    <definitionphysical><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
                    <dataprovider name="Database - READ">
                    <specific>
                    <dbsource>__ABS_INTERNAL_DB_SOURCE__</dbsource>
                    <query_used>false</query_used>
                    <query>SELECT ACCOUNT, COUNTRY, REGION, STATE, AMOUNT FROM dbo."AC001"</query>
                    <table>dbo.AC001</table>
                    <pass_through>false</pass_through>
                    <sorted>true</sorted>
                    </specific>
                    </dataprovider>
                    </definitionphysical>
                    <redaction><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
                    <RedactionRules/>
                    </redaction>
                    <definitioninfo>
                    <dataprovider name="Database - READ">
                    <common>
                    <fields>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="AMOUNT" order="5" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="1" isvisible="1" name="STATE" order="4" type="STRING"/>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="1" isvisible="1" name="REGION" order="3" type="STRING"/>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="1" isvisible="1" name="COUNTRY" order="2" type="STRING"/>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="1" isvisible="1" name="ACCOUNT" order="1" type="STRING"/>
                    </fields>
                    </common>
                    </dataprovider>
                    </definitioninfo>
                    </data_source>
                    <!-- [WS Output] ASCII_out AS ASCII file -->
                    <data_source dsdname="ASCII files" enabled="yes" is_auto_download="false" is_input="false" is_output="true" name="ASCII_out" type="DSV">
                    <definition><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
                    <dataprovider name="">
                    <common>
                    <fields>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="Amount" order="5" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="State" order="4" type="STRING"/>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="Region" order="3" type="STRING"/>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="Country" order="2" type="STRING"/>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="1" isvisible="1" name="Account" order="1" type="STRING"/>
                    </fields>
                    </common>
                    </dataprovider>
                    </definition>
                    <definitionphysical><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
                    <dataprovider is_auto_download="false" is_input="false" is_output="true" name="ASCII files">
                    <common>
                    <fields>
                    <field data_format="&lt;?xml version=&quot;1.0&quot; encoding=&quot;UTF-8&quot; standalone=&quot;no&quot;?&gt;&#13;&#10;&lt;format&gt;&#13;&#10;&lt;format_type&gt;NUMERIC&lt;/format_type&gt;&#13;&#10;&lt;pattern&gt;#,###.#############&lt;/pattern&gt;&#13;&#10;&lt;digit_grouping&gt;#,###.##&lt;/digit_grouping&gt;&#13;&#10;&lt;allow_decimal_point&gt;true&lt;/allow_decimal_point&gt;&#13;&#10;&lt;allow_currency&gt;false&lt;/allow_currency&gt;&#13;&#10;&lt;currency_symbol&gt;$&lt;/currency_symbol&gt;&#13;&#10;&lt;/format&gt;&#13;&#10;" name="Amount" order="5" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    <field name="State" order="4" type="STRING"/>
                    <field name="Region" order="3" type="STRING"/>
                    <field name="Country" order="2" type="STRING"/>
                    <field name="Account" order="1" type="STRING"/>
                    </fields>
                    </common>
                    <specific>
                    <file name="/home/mobius/DATA/ascii_ac001_out_test.txt" overwrite="true"/>
                    <tolerance converting_option="0" log_entry="false" name="&lt;errorfilename&gt;" use_err_file="false">
                    <skip_line>#</skip_line>
                    <skip_line>&amp;&amp;</skip_line>
                    </tolerance>
                    <sorted>true</sorted>
                    <format delimiter=";(semicolon)" escape="0" qualifier="{none}" type="Delimited" use_header="false"/>
                    <columns>
                    <column position="5" width="0"/>
                    <column position="4" width="0"/>
                    <column position="3" width="0"/>
                    <column position="2" width="0"/>
                    <column position="1" width="0"/>
                    </columns>
                    </specific>
                    </dataprovider>
                    </definitionphysical>
                    <redaction><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
                    <RedactionRules/>
                    </redaction>
                    <definitioninfo>
                    <dataprovider name="ASCII files">
                    <common>
                    <fields>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="Amount" order="5" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="State" order="4" type="STRING"/>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="Region" order="3" type="STRING"/>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="Country" order="2" type="STRING"/>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="1" isvisible="1" name="Account" order="1" type="STRING"/>
                    </fields>
                    </common>
                    </dataprovider>
                    </definitioninfo>
                    </data_source>
                    <!-- AC001keys AS Database - READ -->
                    <data_source dsdname="Database - READ" enabled="yes" is_auto_download="false" is_input="false" is_output="false" name="AC001keys" type="DSV">
                    <definition><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
                    <dataprovider name="">
                    <common>
                    <fields>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="STATE" order="4" type="STRING"/>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="REGION" order="3" type="STRING"/>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="COUNTRY" order="2" type="STRING"/>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="ACCOUNT" order="1" type="STRING"/>
                    </fields>
                    </common>
                    </dataprovider>
                    </definition>
                    <definitionphysical><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
                    <dataprovider name="Database - READ">
                    <specific>
                    <dbsource>__ABS_INTERNAL_DB_SOURCE__</dbsource>
                    <query_used>false</query_used>
                    <query>SELECT ACCOUNT, COUNTRY, REGION, STATE FROM dbo."AC001_KEYS"</query>
                    <table>dbo.AC001_KEYS</table>
                    <pass_through>false</pass_through>
                    <sorted>true</sorted>
                    </specific>
                    </dataprovider>
                    </definitionphysical>
                    <redaction><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
                    <RedactionRules/>
                    </redaction>
                    <definitioninfo>
                    <dataprovider name="Database - READ">
                    <common>
                    <fields>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="STATE" order="4" type="STRING"/>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="REGION" order="3" type="STRING"/>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="COUNTRY" order="2" type="STRING"/>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="ACCOUNT" order="1" type="STRING"/>
                    </fields>
                    </common>
                    </dataprovider>
                    </definitioninfo>
                    </data_source>
                    </data_sources>
                    <options>
                    <!-- DATE_FORMAT  =  M/D/YYYY -->
                    <option displayvalue="M/D/YYYY" name="DATE_FORMAT" value=""/>
                    <!-- NUMERIC_FORMAT  =  -#,###.## -->
                    <option displayvalue="-#,###.##" name="NUMERIC_FORMAT" value=""/>
                    <!-- FILE_ENCODING  =  UTF-8 -->
                    <option displayvalue="UTF-8" name="FILE_ENCODING" value="UTF-8"/>
                    <!-- GENLEVEL  =  APPLICATION -->
                    <option displayvalue="APPLICATION" name="GENLEVEL" value="APPLICATION"/>
                    <!-- NO_VALUE  =  ERROR -->
                    <option displayvalue="ERROR" name="NO_VALUE" value="ERROR"/>
                    </options>
                    </declarations>
                    <cases>
                    <!-- ON_START REPORT -->
                    <case id="100161" name="report" type="start">
                    <block/>
                    </case>
                    <!-- ON_EACH RECORD -->
                    <case id="100163" name="record" type="each">
                    <block>
                    <!-- PRINTLOG  ( "LOCATE using Account = "  +    ACCOUNT + " , Country = "  +   COUNTRY  + " , Region = "  +   REGION + " , State = "  +  STATE ) -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="322820" type="printlog">
                    <printlog>"LOCATE using Account = "  +    ACCOUNT + " , Country = "  +   COUNTRY  + " , Region = "  +   REGION + " , State = "  +  STATE</printlog>
                    </statement>
                    <!-- LOCATE  ( AC001values  , ACCOUNT=ACCOUNT  , COUNTRY=COUNTRY  , REGION=REGION  , STATE=STATE  , AMOUNT=AmountNUMarray  ) -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="322821" type="locate">
                    <DSV>AC001values</DSV>
                    <locateparameters>
                    <locateparameter>AmountNUMarray</locateparameter>
                    </locateparameters>
                    <locatekeyparameters>
                    <locatekeyparameter>ACCOUNT</locatekeyparameter>
                    <locatekeyparameter>COUNTRY</locatekeyparameter>
                    <locatekeyparameter>REGION</locatekeyparameter>
                    <locatekeyparameter>STATE</locatekeyparameter>
                    </locatekeyparameters>
                    </statement>
                    <!-- nArray = 0 -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="322822" type="assignment">
                    <var name="nArray">0</var>
                    </statement>
                    <!-- AmountNUM = FOREACH ARRAY ( AmountNUMarray [  ]  ) -->
                    <statement active_entity="eArray" enabled="yes" id="322823" type="foreach">
                    <tokenizer delimiter="" is_include="false" is_pattern="true" is_replacement="false" is_use_regexp_delimiter="false" is_use_regexp_pattern="false" pattern="" replacement="" source_var="" targe_vart=""/>
                    <array arr_name="AmountNUMarray" var_name="AmountNUM"/>
                    <block>
                    <!-- nArray = nArray + 1 -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="322824" type="assignment">
                    <var name="nArray">nArray + 1</var>
                    </statement>
                    <!-- PRINTLOG  ( FORMAT(nArray,"########")  + ". "  +   ACCOUNT   + " , " +  COUNTRY + " , " +   REGION + " , " +  STATE + " , " +  AmountNUM ) -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="322825" type="printlog">
                    <printlog>FORMAT(nArray,"########")  + ". "  +   ACCOUNT   + " , " +  COUNTRY + " , " +   REGION + " , " +  STATE + " , " +  AmountNUM</printlog>
                    </statement>
                    <!-- WRITE  ( ASCII_out  , ACCOUNT , COUNTRY , REGION , STATE , AmountNUM ) -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="322826" type="write">
                    <DSV>ASCII_out</DSV>
                    <writeparameters>
                    <writeparameter>ACCOUNT</writeparameter>
                    <writeparameter>COUNTRY</writeparameter>
                    <writeparameter>REGION</writeparameter>
                    <writeparameter>STATE</writeparameter>
                    <writeparameter>AmountNUM</writeparameter>
                    </writeparameters>
                    </statement>
                    </block>
                    </statement>
                    <!-- AmountNUMarray [  ]  CLEAR -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="322827" type="array_clear">
                    <params arr_name="AmountNUMarray"/>
                    </statement>
                    </block>
                    </case>
                    <!-- ON_END REPORT -->
                    <case id="100162" name="report" type="end">
                    <block>
                    <!-- CLOSE ASCII_out -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="322828" type="close">
                    <target name="ASCII_out"/>
                    </statement>
                    </block>
                    </case>
                    </cases>
                    </procedure>

Application.name: RedactionDemo
Application.description: This application explains a simple Rule Procedure, which explains about default redaction rules.

BalancingItem.name: RedactionTask
BalancingItem.description: This demo explains a simple Rule Procedure, which explains about default redaction rules.
BalancingItem.XMLProcedure:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
                    <procedure autoDownload="false" downloadIntermediate="false" name="/RedactionDemo/RedactionTask" primarydsv="" rpname="RedactionRuleRP" scriptPath="null" type="dsrp" uuid="6009bea-16eacaee820-00ef7662b53dc0f0afa8e8adbe1fdfa3" writeToDatabase="false" zipResults="false">
                    <declarations>
                    <parameters/>
                    <fields comment=""/>
                    <variables/>
                    <data_sources>
                    <!-- ds_sample_from AS ASCII file -->
                    <data_source dsdname="ASCII files" enabled="yes" is_auto_download="false" is_input="false" is_output="false" name="ds_sample_from" type="DSV">
                    <definition><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
                    <dataprovider name="">
                    <common>
                    <fields>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="EmailWithDomain" order="12" type="STRING"/>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="Email" order="11" type="STRING"/>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="Date" order="10" type="STRING"/>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="USPhoneLast4" order="9" type="STRING"/>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="USPhone" order="8" type="STRING"/>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="AmEx" order="7" type="STRING"/>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="MasterVisa" order="6" type="STRING"/>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="CaliforniaDriverLic" order="5" type="STRING"/>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="EIN" order="4" type="STRING"/>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="TIN" order="3" type="STRING"/>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="SSNwithLast4" order="2" type="STRING"/>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="SSN" order="1" type="STRING"/>
                    </fields>
                    </common>
                    </dataprovider>
                    </definition>
                    <definitionphysical><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
                    <dataprovider is_auto_download="false" is_input="false" is_output="false" name="ASCII files">
                    <common>
                    <fields>
                    <field name="EmailWithDomain" order="12" type="STRING"/>
                    <field name="Email" order="11" type="STRING"/>
                    <field name="Date" order="10" type="STRING"/>
                    <field name="USPhoneLast4" order="9" type="STRING"/>
                    <field name="USPhone" order="8" type="STRING"/>
                    <field name="AmEx" order="7" type="STRING"/>
                    <field name="MasterVisa" order="6" type="STRING"/>
                    <field name="CaliforniaDriverLic" order="5" type="STRING"/>
                    <field name="EIN" order="4" type="STRING"/>
                    <field name="TIN" order="3" type="STRING"/>
                    <field name="SSNwithLast4" order="2" type="STRING"/>
                    <field name="SSN" order="1" type="STRING"/>
                    </fields>
                    </common>
                    <specific>
                    <file name="/home/mobius/Samples/Default_Redaction_Rules/DATA/sample_red_rule.csv" overwrite="false"/>
                    <tolerance converting_option="0" log_entry="true" name="" use_err_file="false">
                    <skip_line>#</skip_line>
                    <skip_line>&amp;&amp;</skip_line>
                    </tolerance>
                    <sorted>false</sorted>
                    <format delimiter=",(comma)" escape="0" qualifier="{none}" type="Delimited" use_header="false"/>
                    <columns>
                    <column position="12" width="0"/>
                    <column position="11" width="0"/>
                    <column position="10" width="0"/>
                    <column position="9" width="0"/>
                    <column position="8" width="0"/>
                    <column position="7" width="0"/>
                    <column position="6" width="0"/>
                    <column position="5" width="0"/>
                    <column position="4" width="0"/>
                    <column position="3" width="0"/>
                    <column position="2" width="0"/>
                    <column position="1" width="0"/>
                    </columns>
                    </specific>
                    </dataprovider>
                    </definitionphysical>
                    <redaction><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
                    <RedactionRules>
                    <RedactionItem>
                    <FieldName>SSN</FieldName>
                    <RedactionRule Name="SSN" MatchExpression="\\d{3}-\\d{2}-\\d{4}" ReplacementExpression="XXX-XX-XXXX" CaseInsensitive="N" FirstOnly="N" DBCS="N" UseLocale="N" Description="Social Security Number (SSN)"/>
                    </RedactionItem>
                    <RedactionItem>
                    <FieldName>SSNwithLast4</FieldName>
                    <RedactionRule Name="SSN with last 4" MatchExpression="\\d{3}-\\d{2}-(\\d{4})" ReplacementExpression="XXX-XX-$1" CaseInsensitive="N" FirstOnly="N" DBCS="N" UseLocale="N" Description="SSN with last 4.Preserves last 4 digits"/>
                    </RedactionItem>
                    <RedactionItem>
                    <FieldName>TIN</FieldName>
                    <RedactionRule Name="TIN" MatchExpression="\\d{3}-\\d{2}-\\d{4}" ReplacementExpression="XXX-XX-XXXX" CaseInsensitive="N" FirstOnly="N" DBCS="N" UseLocale="N" Description="Taxpayer Identification Number (TIN)"/>
                    </RedactionItem>
                    <RedactionItem>
                    <FieldName>EIN</FieldName>
                    <RedactionRule Name="EIN" MatchExpression="\\d{2}-\\d{7}" ReplacementExpression="XX-XXXXXXX" CaseInsensitive="N" FirstOnly="N" DBCS="N" UseLocale="N" Description="Employer Identification Number (EIN)"/>
                    </RedactionItem>
                    <RedactionItem>
                    <FieldName>CaliforniaDriverLic</FieldName>
                    <RedactionRule Name="California Driver License" MatchExpression="[A-Z]{1}\\d{7}" ReplacementExpression="XXXXXXXX" CaseInsensitive="N" FirstOnly="N" DBCS="N" UseLocale="N" Description="California Driver License"/>
                    </RedactionItem>
                    <RedactionItem>
                    <FieldName>MasterVisa</FieldName>
                    <RedactionRule Name="MasterCard/Visa" MatchExpression="\\d{4}-\\d{4}-\\d{4}-(\\d{4})" ReplacementExpression="XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-$1" CaseInsensitive="N" FirstOnly="N" DBCS="N" UseLocale="N" Description="MasterCard/Visa.Preserves last 4 digits"/>
                    </RedactionItem>
                    <RedactionItem>
                    <FieldName>AmEx</FieldName>
                    <RedactionRule Name="American Express" MatchExpression="\\d{4}-\\d{6}-(\\d{4})" ReplacementExpression="XXXX-XXXXXX-$1" CaseInsensitive="N" FirstOnly="N" DBCS="N" UseLocale="N" Description="American Express.Preserves last 4 digits"/>
                    </RedactionItem>
                    <RedactionItem>
                    <FieldName>USPhone</FieldName>
                    <RedactionRule Name="US phone number" MatchExpression="\\(\\d{3}\\)\\d{3}-\\d{4}" ReplacementExpression="(XXX)XXX-XXXX" CaseInsensitive="N" FirstOnly="N" DBCS="N" UseLocale="N" Description="US phone number"/>
                    </RedactionItem>
                    <RedactionItem>
                    <FieldName>USPhoneLast4</FieldName>
                    <RedactionRule Name="US phone number with last 4" MatchExpression="\\(\\d{3}\\)\\d{3}-(\\d{4})" ReplacementExpression="(XXX)XXX-$1" CaseInsensitive="N" FirstOnly="N" DBCS="N" UseLocale="N" Description="US phone number with last 4.Preserves last 4 digits"/>
                    </RedactionItem>
                    <RedactionItem>
                    <FieldName>Date</FieldName>
                    <RedactionRule Name="Date" MatchExpression="\\d{2}\\/\\d{2}\\/\\d{4}" ReplacementExpression="XX/XX/XXXX" CaseInsensitive="N" FirstOnly="N" DBCS="N" UseLocale="N" Description="Date.Preserves last 4 digits"/>
                    </RedactionItem>
                    <RedactionItem>
                    <FieldName>Email</FieldName>
                    <RedactionRule Name="Email address" MatchExpression="\\w+?@\\w+?\\x2E.+" ReplacementExpression="xxx@xxx.xxx" CaseInsensitive="N" FirstOnly="N" DBCS="N" UseLocale="N" Description="Email address"/>
                    </RedactionItem>
                    <RedactionItem>
                    <FieldName>EmailWithDomain</FieldName>
                    <RedactionRule Name="Email address with domain" MatchExpression="\\w+?@(\\w+?\\x2E.+)" ReplacementExpression="xxx@$1" CaseInsensitive="N" FirstOnly="N" DBCS="N" UseLocale="N" Description="Email address with domain. Preserves domain"/>
                    </RedactionItem>
                    </RedactionRules>
                    </redaction>
                    <definitioninfo>
                    <dataprovider name="ASCII files">
                    <common>
                    <fields>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="EmailWithDomain" order="12" type="STRING"/>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="Email" order="11" type="STRING"/>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="Date" order="10" type="STRING"/>
