Application.name: RegularExpressionsDemo
Application.description: This application explains a simple Rule Procedure that replaces Account number of 16 digits with XXXXXXX...nnnn, keeping last 4 characters of Account number. The intent behind is to mask sensitive data, such as social security numbers, credit card numbers etc.

BalancingItem.name: RegExpBI
BalancingItem.description: This demo explains a simple Rule Procedure that replaces Account number of 16 digits with XXXXXXX...nnnn, keeping last 4 characters of Account number. The intent behind this is to mask sensitive data, such as social security numbers, credit card numbers etc.
BalancingItem.XMLProcedure:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
                    <procedure autoDownload="false" downloadIntermediate="false" name="/RegularExpressionsDemo/RegExpBI" primarydsv="ReportDSV" rpname="RegExpRP" scriptPath="null" type="dsrp" uuid="6009bea-16eacaee8af-00ef7662b53dc0f0afa8e8adbe1fdfa3" writeToDatabase="false" zipResults="false">
                    <declarations>
                    <parameters/>
                    <fields>
                    <!-- RowSTR AS STRING -->
                    <field level="1" name="RowSTR" type="STRING"/>
                    </fields>
                    <variables>
                    <!-- InputString AS STRING -->
                    <variable enabled="yes" name="InputString" type="STRING"/>
                    <!-- TargetString AS STRING -->
                    <variable enabled="yes" name="TargetString" type="STRING"/>
                    </variables>
                    <data_sources>
                    <!-- OutputDSV AS ASCII file -->
                    <data_source dsdname="ASCII files" enabled="yes" is_auto_download="false" is_input="false" is_output="false" name="OutputDSV" type="DSV">
                    <definition><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
                    <dataprovider name="">
                    <common>
                    <fields>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="RowSTR" order="1" type="STRING"/>
                    </fields>
                    </common>
                    </dataprovider>
                    </definition>
                    <definitionphysical><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
                    <dataprovider is_auto_download="false" is_input="false" is_output="false" name="ASCII files">
                    <common>
                    <fields>
                    <field name="RowSTR" order="1" type="STRING"/>
                    </fields>
                    </common>
                    <specific>
                    <file name="/home/mobius/DATA/EncryptedReport.txt" overwrite="true"/>
                    <tolerance converting_option="0" log_entry="false" name="" use_err_file="false">
                    <skip_line>#</skip_line>
                    <skip_line>&amp;&amp;</skip_line>
                    </tolerance>
                    <sorted>true</sorted>
                    <format delimiter="{tab}" escape="0" qualifier="{none}" type="Delimited" use_header="false"/>
                    <columns>
                    <column position="1" width="0"/>
                    </columns>
                    </specific>
                    </dataprovider>
                    </definitionphysical>
                    <redaction><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
                    <RedactionRules/>
                    </redaction>
                    <definitioninfo>
                    <dataprovider name="ASCII files">
                    <common>
                    <fields>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="RowSTR" order="1" type="STRING"/>
                    </fields>
                    </common>
                    </dataprovider>
                    </definitioninfo>
                    </data_source>
                    <!-- ReportDSV AS ASCII file -->
                    <data_source dsdname="ASCII files" enabled="yes" is_auto_download="false" is_input="false" is_output="false" name="ReportDSV" type="DSV">
                    <definition><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
                    <dataprovider name="">
                    <common>
                    <fields>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="RowSTR" order="1" type="STRING"/>
                    </fields>
                    </common>
                    </dataprovider>
                    </definition>
                    <definitionphysical><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
                    <dataprovider is_auto_download="false" is_input="false" is_output="false" name="ASCII files">
                    <common>
                    <fields>
                    <field name="RowSTR" order="1" type="STRING"/>
                    </fields>
                    </common>
                    <specific>
                    <file name="/home/mobius/Samples/RegExp_sample/DATA/ReportExample.txt" overwrite="false"/>
                    <tolerance converting_option="0" log_entry="false" name="" use_err_file="false">
                    <skip_line>#</skip_line>
                    <skip_line>&amp;&amp;</skip_line>
                    </tolerance>
                    <sorted>true</sorted>
                    <format delimiter="{tab}" escape="0" qualifier="{none}" type="Delimited" use_header="false"/>
                    <columns>
                    <column position="1" width="0"/>
                    </columns>
                    </specific>
                    </dataprovider>
                    </definitionphysical>
                    <redaction><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
                    <RedactionRules/>
                    </redaction>
                    <definitioninfo>
                    <dataprovider name="ASCII files">
                    <common>
                    <fields>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="RowSTR" order="1" type="STRING"/>
                    </fields>
                    </common>
                    </dataprovider>
                    </definitioninfo>
                    </data_source>
                    </data_sources>
                    <options>
                    <!-- DATE_FORMAT  =  M/D/YYYY -->
                    <option displayvalue="M/D/YYYY" name="DATE_FORMAT" value=""/>
                    <!-- NUMERIC_FORMAT  =  -#,###.## -->
                    <option displayvalue="-#,###.##" name="NUMERIC_FORMAT" value=""/>
                    <!-- FILE_ENCODING  =  UTF-8 -->
                    <option displayvalue="UTF-8" name="FILE_ENCODING" value="UTF-8"/>
                    <!-- GENLEVEL  =  APPLICATION -->
                    <option displayvalue="APPLICATION" name="GENLEVEL" value="APPLICATION"/>
                    <!-- NO_VALUE  =  ERROR -->
                    <option displayvalue="ERROR" name="NO_VALUE" value="ERROR"/>
                    </options>
                    </declarations>
                    <cases>
                    <!-- ON_START REPORT -->
                    <case id="100176" name="report" type="start">
                    <block/>
                    </case>
                    <!-- ON_EACH RECORD -->
                    <case id="100178" name="record" type="each">
                    <block>
                    <!-- InputString = RowSTR -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4132411" type="assignment">
                    <var name="InputString">RowSTR</var>
                    </statement>
                    <!-- TargetString = TOKENIZER ( InputString , patten:"\\b\\d{12}" , "XXXXXXXXXXXX" ) -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4132412" type="tokenizer">
                    <params delimiter="" is_include="false" is_pattern="true" is_replacement="true" is_use_regexp_delimiter="false" is_use_regexp_pattern="true" pattern=""\\b\\d{12}"" replacement=""XXXXXXXXXXXX"" source_var="InputString" targe_vart="TargetString"/>
                    <wizard is_wizard_valid="true">
                    <init_wizard boundary_option="eWhitespaceEnd" chars_end_skip_from="0" chars_end_skip_to="0" chars_start_skip_from="0" chars_start_skip_to="0" extract_option="eText" is_use_boundary="true"/>
                    <text_wizard is_match_case="false" patterms_qnt="1" pattern0="\\d{12}"/>
                    </wizard>
                    </statement>
                    <!-- WRITE  ( OutputDSV  , TargetString ) -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4132413" type="write">
                    <DSV>OutputDSV</DSV>
                    <writeparameters>
                    <writeparameter>TargetString</writeparameter>
                    </writeparameters>
                    </statement>
                    </block>
                    </case>
                    <!-- ON_END REPORT -->
                    <case id="100177" name="report" type="end">
                    <block>
                    <!-- PRINTLOG  ( "Encrypted report saved to file: "  +   FILENAME(OutputDSV) ) -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4132414" type="printlog">
                    <printlog>"Encrypted report saved to file: "  +   FILENAME(OutputDSV)</printlog>
                    </statement>
                    <!-- RETURN SUCCESS , "RP completed" , Pending -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4132415" type="return">
                    <return code="0" error_message=""RP completed"" status="3"/>
                    </statement>
                    </block>
                    </case>
                    </cases>
                    </procedure>

Application.name: ApplStRet02
Application.description: This application demonstrates Store and Retrieve command. Refer `Store_Retrieve_Genlevel_Demo` sample for more details

BalancingItem.name: AC001
BalancingItem.description:

1) RETRIEVE - GENLEVEL options 2) RETRIEVE from cycle with gaps considerations 3) RETRIEVE from this run only

BalancingItem.name: BIstRet03
BalancingItem.description:

1) RETRIEVE - GENLEVEL options 2) RETRIEVE from cycle with gaps considerations 3) RETRIEVE from this run only

Application.name: MobiusArchiving
Application.description: This application demonstrates the usage of Archiving Rule Procedure

BalancingItem.name: ADDRBOOK
BalancingItem.description: ViewDirect for Networks sends a request to Audit and Analytics Services, which checks its database to determine if a Task exists for the indicated policy and Report ID. If so, Audit and Analytics Services retrieves the associated rule procedure and runs it.
BalancingItem.XMLProcedure: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <procedure name="/MobiusArchiving/ADDRBOOK" rpname="ADDRBOOKR" type="brp" </fields> <variables> <!-- OLD_EMAIL AS STRING --> <variable enabled="yes" name="OLD_EMAIL" type="STRING"/> </variables> <data_sources/> <options> <!-- DATE_FORMAT = M/D/YYYY --> <option displayvalue="ZERO" name="NO_VALUE" value="ZERO"/> </options> </declarations> <cases> <!-- ON_START REPORT --> <case id="100013" name="report" type="start"> <block> <!-- PRINTLOG ( "Processsing new version of Address Book on "+SYSTEM_DATE ) --> <statement enabled="yes" id="17124" type="printlog"> <printlog>"Processsing new version of Address Book on "+SYSTEM_DATE</printlog> </statement> <!-- CURRENT_CYCLE = APPLICATION_CYCLE(1) --> <statement enabled="yes" id="17125" type="assignment"> <var name="CURRENT_CYCLE">APPLICATION_CYCLE(1)</var> </statement> </block> </case> <!-- ON_EACH RECORD BalancingItem.name: BUDGET
BalancingItem.description: BUDGET rule procedure is designed to balance simple reports. You can process several runs of the BUDGET rule procedure against data extracted from a series of reports.
BalancingItem.XMLProcedure: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <procedure name="/MobiusArchiving/BUDGET" rpname="BUDGET" type="brp" uuid="6cbbf788-16b88c3f810-2eee347402ff468a92931a494e3e8463"> <declarations> <fields comment=""> <!-- DEPARTMENT AS STRING --> <field group="BUDGET" keyfield="yes" level="1" name="DEPARTMENT" type="STRING"/> <!-- GROUP AS STRING --> <field group="BUDGET" keyfield="yes" level="2" name="GROUP" type="STRING"/> <!-- DEP_GROUP_NAME AS STRING --> <field group="BUDGET" level="2" name="DEP_GROUP_NAME" type="STRING"/> <!-- ACCOUNT AS STRING --> <field group="BUDGET" keyfield="yes" level="3" name="ACCOUNT" type="STRING"/> <!-- ACTUAL AS NUMERIC --> <field group="BUDGET" level="3" name="ACTUAL" type="NUMERIC"/> <!-- BUDGET AS NUMERIC --> <field group="BUDGET" level="3" name="BUDGET" type="NUMERIC"/> <!-- YTD_ACT AS NUMERIC --> <field group="BUDGET" level="3" name="YTD_ACT" type="NUMERIC"/> <!-- YTD_BUD AS NUMERIC --> <field group="BUDGET" level="3" name="YTD_BUD" type="NUMERIC"/> </fields> <variables> <!-- REP_FLAG AS NUMERIC --> <variable comment="Report level over-the-budget flag" enabled="yes" name="REP_FLAG" type="NUMERIC"/> <!-- OVERSPENT AS NUMERIC --> <variable comment="Amount over the budget for each group" enabled="yes" name="OVERSPENT" type="NUMERIC"/> <!-- EMAILADDR AS STRING --> <variable comment="Email address of the group budget manager" enabled="yes" name="EMAILADDR" type="STRING"/> <!-- REPORTNAME AS STRING --> <variable comment="Pathname of the archived report (.DAF file)" enabled="yes" name="REPORTNAME" type="STRING"/> </variables> <data_sources> <!-- REPORTFILE AS Free Form Text file --> <data_source dsdname="Free Form Text files" enabled="yes" is_auto_download="false" is_input="false" is_output="false" name="REPORTFILE" type="DSV"> <definition><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <dataprovider name=""> <common> <fields> <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="0" name="Message" order="1" type="STRING"/> </fields> </common> </dataprovider> </definition> <definitionphysical><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <dataprovider name="Free Form Text files"> <specific> <file expressions="false" footer="" header="Page # Budget Report" name="/home/mobius/DATA/BudgetReport.txt" overwrite="false" page="#" rows="5"/> </specific> </dataprovider> </definitionphysical> <redaction><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?> <RedactionRules/> </redaction> <definitioninfo> <dataprovider name="Free Form Text files"> <common> <fields> <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="0" name="Message" order="1" type="STRING"/> </fields> </common> </dataprovider> </definitioninfo> </data_source> </data_sources> <options> <!-- DATE_FORMAT = M/D/YYYY --> <option displayvalue="M/D/YYYY" name="DATE_FORMAT" value=""/> <!-- NUMERIC_FORMAT = -#,###.## --> <option displayvalue="-#,###.##" name="NUMERIC_FORMAT" value=""/> <!-- FILE_ENCODING = UTF-8 --> <option displayvalue="UTF-8" name="FILE_ENCODING" value="UTF-8"/> <!-- GENLEVEL = APPLICATION --> <option displayvalue="APPLICATION" name="GENLEVEL" value="APPLICATION"/> <!-- NO_VALUE = ERROR --> <option displayvalue="ERROR" name="NO_VALUE" value="ERROR"/> </options> </declarations> <cases> <!-- ON_START REPORT --> <case id="100016" name="report" type="start"> <block> <!-- PRINTLOG ( "Starting processing of report "+REPORT_ID ) --> <statement comment="Logging start of the report in audit log" enabled="yes" id="18155" type="printlog"> <printlog>"Starting processing of report "+REPORT_ID</printlog> </statement> <!-- // CURRENT_CYCLE = REPORT_VERSION --> <statement comment="Setting cycle value equal to report version (allows to rerun previous versions of reports)" enabled="no" id="18156" type="assignment"> <var name="CURRENT_CYCLE">REPORT_VERSION</var> </statement> <!-- REP_FLAG = 0 --> <statement comment="Setting out of balance flag to 0" enabled="yes" id="18157" type="assignment"> <var name="REP_FLAG">0</var> </statement> <!-- REPORTNAME = "file://C:\\DAFS\\"+ REPORT_ID+"\\"+ REPORT_ID+".DAF" --> <statement comment="Storing archived report (DAF) pathname in the variable (needed for email)" enabled="yes" id="18158" type="assignment"> <var name="REPORTNAME">"file://C:\\DAFS\\"+ REPORT_ID+"\\"+ REPORT_ID+".DAF"</var> </statement> </block> </case> <!-- ON_START DEPARTMENT --> <case field="DEPARTMENT" id="100019" name="field" type="start"> <block> <!-- PRINTLOG ( "Processing department "+DEPARTMENT+"("+DEP_GROUP_NAME.trim()+")" ) --> <statement comment="Logging start of the department processing in audit log" enabled="yes" id="18159" type="printlog"> <printlog>"Processing department "+DEPARTMENT+"("+DEP_GROUP_NAME.trim()+")"</printlog> </statement> </block> </case> <!-- ON_START GROUP --> <case field="GROUP" id="100020" name="field" type="start"> <block> <!-- RETRIEVE ( EMAILADDR , /MobiusArchiving , ADDRBOOK.EMAIL , KEY ( DEPARTMENT , GROUP ) , GENLEVEL = SOURCE , NO_VALUE = ERROR ) --> <statement comment="Retrieve group budget manager email from the address book created by processing ADDRBOOK" enabled="yes" id="18160" type="retrieve"> <rpvariable>EMAILADDR</rpvariable> <cdbvariable>EMAIL</cdbvariable> <balancingitem>/MobiusArchiving/ADDRBOOK</balancingitem> <key name="___KEY$$18160" type="KEY"> <keyvars> <!-- DEPARTMENT AS STRING --> <field group="BUDGET" keyfield="yes" level="1" name="DEPARTMENT" type="STRING"/> <!-- GROUP AS STRING --> <field group="BUDGET" keyfield="yes" level="2" name="GROUP" type="STRING"/> </keyvars> <keyfields> <variable enabled="yes" name="DEPARTMENT" type="STRING"/> <variable enabled="yes" name="GROUP" type="STRING"/> </keyfields> </key> <runnumber>0</runnumber> <use_db>false</use_db> <retrieveoptions> <retrieveoption name="GENLEVEL" value="SOURCE"/> <retrieveoption name="NO_VALUE" value="ERROR"/> </retrieveoptions> </statement> <!-- ON ERROR --> <statement enabled="yes" id="18161" type="onerror"> <block> <!-- PRINTLOG ( "Email for group "+GROUP+" not found" ) --> <statement enabled="yes" id="18162" type="printlog"> <printlog>"Email for group "+GROUP+" not found"</printlog> </statement> </block> </statement> <!-- PRINTFILE ( REPORTFILE , "GROUP="+ GROUP , FORCE_NEW_PAGE = no ) --> <statement enabled="yes" id="18163" type="printfile" usecdb="false"> <params balancingitemfixed="0" cdbvarfixed="1" cyclestart="0" relativecycle="false" runstart="3"/> <target forcenewpage="0" name="REPORTFILE">"GROUP="+ GROUP</target> </statement> <!-- PRINTLOG ( "Processing group "+GROUP+"("+DEP_GROUP_NAME.trim()+") Email="+ EMAILADDR ) --> <statement comment="Logging start of the group processing in audit log" enabled="yes" id="18164" type="printlog"> <printlog>"Processing group "+GROUP+"("+DEP_GROUP_NAME.trim()+") Email="+ EMAILADDR</printlog> </statement> </block> </case> <!-- ON_EACH RECORD --> <case id="100018" name="record" type="each"> <block> <!-- PRINTFILE ( REPORTFILE , "Account "+ ACCOUNT+"="+ ACTUAL , FORCE_NEW_PAGE = no ) --> <statement enabled="yes" id="18165" type="printfile" usecdb="false"> <params balancingitemfixed="0" cdbvarfixed="1" cyclestart="0" relativecycle="false" runstart="3"/> <target forcenewpage="0" name="REPORTFILE">"Account "+ ACCOUNT+"="+ ACTUAL</target> </statement> <!-- IF ACCOUNT.trim() = "Total OPERATING EXPENSE" --> <statement comment="Checking if we reached total line of the report" enabled="yes" id="18166" type="condition"> <if>ACCOUNT.trim() = "Total OPERATING EXPENSE"</if> <conditionitems> <conditionitem andor="" comparison="=" lexpression="ACCOUNT.trim()" lparen="" not="" rexpression=""Total OPERATING EXPENSE"" rparen=""/> </conditionitems> <then> <block> <!-- STORE ( ACTUAL , ACTUAL , KEY ( DEPARTMENT , GROUP ) ) --> <statement comment="Storing total actual expenses for the month" enabled="yes" id="18167" inmemory="no" maxrecords="-1" permanently="no" type="store"> <rpvariable>ACTUAL</rpvariable> <cdbvariable>ACTUAL</cdbvariable> <key name="___KEY$$18167" type="KEY"> <keyvars> <!-- DEPARTMENT AS STRING --> <field group="BUDGET" keyfield="yes" level="1" name="DEPARTMENT" type="STRING"/> <!-- GROUP AS STRING --> <field group="BUDGET" keyfield="yes" level="2" name="GROUP" type="STRING"/> </keyvars> <keyfields> <variable enabled="yes" name="DEPARTMENT" type="STRING"/> <variable enabled="yes" name="GROUP" type="STRING"/> </keyfields> </key> </statement> <!-- IF (ACTUAL- BUDGET)/ BUDGET > 0.05 --> <statement comment="Check if total actual exceeds total budget by more than 5%" enabled="yes" id="18168" type="condition"> <if>(ACTUAL- BUDGET)/ BUDGET > 0.05</if> <conditionitems> <conditionitem andor="" comparison=">" lexpression="(ACTUAL- BUDGET)/ BUDGET" lparen="" not="" rexpression="0.05" rparen=""/> </conditionitems> <then> <block> <!-- REP_FLAG = REP_FLAG+1 --> <statement comment="Increment out of balance group count" enabled="yes" id="18169" type="assignment"> <var name="REP_FLAG">REP_FLAG+1</var> </statement> <!-- PRINTLOG ( "Total actual expenses for "+DEP_GROUP_NAME.trim()+" group exceed budget by $"+(ACTUAL-BUDGET) ) --> <statement comment="Creating out of balance entry in the audit log file" enabled="yes" id="18170" type="printlog"> <printlog>"Total actual expenses for "+DEP_GROUP_NAME.trim()+" group exceed budget by $"+(ACTUAL-BUDGET)</printlog> </statement> <!-- OVERSPENT = ACTUAL- BUDGET --> <statement comment="Calculating amount over budget" enabled="yes" id="18171" type="assignment"> <var name="OVERSPENT">ACTUAL- BUDGET</var> </statement> <!-- RETRIEVE ( EMAILADDR , /MobiusArchiving , ADDRBOOK.EMAIL , KEY ( DEPARTMENT , GROUP ) , NO_VALUE = ZERO ) --> <statement comment="Retrieve group budget manager email from the address book created by processing ADDRBOOK" enabled="yes" id="18172" type="retrieve"> <rpvariable>EMAILADDR</rpvariable> <cdbvariable>EMAIL</cdbvariable> <balancingitem>/MobiusArchiving/ADDRBOOK</balancingitem> <key name="___KEY$$18172" type="KEY"> <keyvars> <!-- DEPARTMENT AS STRING --> <field group="BUDGET" keyfield="yes" level="1" name="DEPARTMENT" type="STRING"/> <!-- GROUP AS STRING --> <field group="BUDGET" keyfield="yes" level="2" name="GROUP" type="STRING"/> </keyvars> <keyfields> <variable enabled="yes" name="DEPARTMENT" type="STRING"/> <variable enabled="yes" name="GROUP" type="STRING"/> </keyfields> </key> <runnumber>0</runnumber> <use_db>false</use_db> <retrieveoptions> <retrieveoption name="NO_VALUE" value="ZERO"/> </retrieveoptions> </statement> <!-- SENDMAIL ( recipient=EMAILADDR, cc="lpfdcomp@asg.com", bcc= , attachments= , subject="Over the budget" , body="Your group exceeded the budget by"+OVERSPENT+". Please take appropriate actions." ) --> <statement enabled="yes" id="18173" type="action"> <provider name="SENDMAIL"/> <parameters> <param name="body">"Your group exceeded the budget by"+OVERSPENT+". Please take appropriate actions."</param> <param name="subject">"Over the budget" </param> <param name="recipient">EMAILADDR</param> <param name="cc">"lpfdcomp@asg.com"</param> </parameters> </statement> <!-- WRITETOPICITEM ( OVER_BUDGET , DEP_GROUP_NAME , Current Page ) --> <statement comment="Create out of budget topic in VDRNET" enabled="yes" id="18174" type="writetopic"> <topic name="OVER_BUDGET" scope="Current Page">DEP_GROUP_NAME</topic> </statement> </block> </then> <else/> </statement> </block> </then> <else/> </statement> </block> </case> <!-- ON_END GROUP --> <case field="GROUP" id="100021" name="field" type="end"> <block/> </case> <!-- ON_END DEPARTMENT --> <case field="DEPARTMENT" id="100022" name="field" type="end"> <block/> </case> <!-- ON_END REPORT --> <case id="100017" name="report" type="end"> <block> <!-- IF APPLICATION_CYCLE < CURRENT_CYCLE --> <statement comment="Check if the report is for the new cycle" enabled="yes" id="18175" type="condition"> <if>APPLICATION_CYCLE < CURRENT_CYCLE</if> <conditionitems> <conditionitem andor="" comparison="<" lexpression="APPLICATION_CYCLE" lparen="" not="" rexpression="CURRENT_CYCLE" rparen=""/> </conditionitems> <then> <block> <!-- APPLICATION_CYCLE = CURRENT_CYCLE --> <statement comment="Advance application cycle" enabled="yes" id="18176" type="assignment"> <var name="APPLICATION_CYCLE">CURRENT_CYCLE</var> </statement> </block> </then> <else/> </statement> <!-- IF REP_FLAG = 0 --> <statement comment="Check if there are groups which exceeded their budgets" enabled="yes" id="18177" type="condition"> <if>REP_FLAG = 0</if> <conditionitems> <conditionitem andor="" comparison="=" lexpression="REP_FLAG" lparen="" not="" rexpression="0" rparen=""/> </conditionitems> <then> <block> <!-- PRINTLOG ( "Processing of report "+REPORT_ID+" completed successfully" ) --> <statement comment="Log successfull completion in the audit log" enabled="yes" id="18178" type="printlog"> <printlog>"Processing of report "+REPORT_ID+" completed successfully"</printlog> </statement> <!-- // EXECUTE ( Target="C:/WINNT/system32/notepad.exe", Params= , Working Folder= , Mode=Synchronous, Timeout= ) --> <statement enabled="no" id="18179" type="action"> <provider name="EXECUTE"/> <parameters> <param name="Target">"C:/WINNT/system32/notepad.exe"</param> <param name="timeout">3600000.0</param> <param name="params">FILENAME( REPORTFILE)</param> <param name="mode">1.0</param> </parameters> </statement> <!-- RETURN SUCCESS , "Report balanced successfully" --> <statement comment="Return success code to ABS Explorer" enabled="yes" id="18180" type="return"> <return code="0" error_message=""Report balanced successfully"" status="-1"/> </statement> </block> </then> <else> <block> <!-- PRINTLOG ( "Processing of report "+REPORT_ID+" completed. "+ REP_FLAG+" groups are over budget" ) --> <statement comment="Log unsuccessfull completion in the audit log" enabled="yes" id="18181" type="printlog"> <printlog>"Processing of report "+REPORT_ID+" completed. "+ REP_FLAG+" groups are over budget"</printlog> </statement> <!-- RETURN EXCEPTION , "Report is out of balance" --> <statement comment="Return error code to ABS Explorer" enabled="yes" id="18182" type="return"> <return code="8" error_message=""Report is out of balance"" status="-1"/> </statement> </block> </else> </statement> </block> </case> </cases> </procedure>

BalancingItem.name: VDR_DataSourceSample1
BalancingItem.description: This demo explains a simple Rule Procedure that takes an input file from VDR and calculates average of each account under it. Post which rule procedure identifies the maximum average of all the accounts listed.
BalancingItem.XMLProcedure: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <procedure name="/MobiusArchiving/VDR_DataSourceSample1" rpname="ABS_Sample1" type="brp" uuid="f04776-f0813d1293-db0d60703c5ad5cf1c637ff206026b7c"> <declarations> <fields comment=""> <!-- REGION AS STRING --> <field group="" keyfield="yes" level="1" name="REGION" type="STRING"/> <!-- OFFICE AS STRING --> <field group="" keyfield="yes" level="2" name="OFFICE" type="STRING"/> <!-- ACCOUNT AS STRING --> <field group="" keyfield="yes" level="3" name="ACCOUNT" type="STRING"/> <!-- AMTD AS NUMERIC --> <field group="" level="3" name="AMTD" type="NUMERIC"/> <!-- PMTD AS NUMERIC --> <field group="" level="3" name="PMTD" type="NUMERIC"/> </fields> <variables> <!-- AccountNum AS NUMERIC --> <variable comment="Variable for accounts number in an office" enabled="yes" name="AccountNum" type="NUMERIC"/> <!-- TotalAMTD AS NUMERIC --> <variable comment="Variable for office Total AMTD" enabled="yes" name="TotalAMTD" type="NUMERIC"/> <!-- AvAMTD AS NUMERIC --> <variable comment="Variable for average" enabled="yes" name="AvAMTD" type="NUMERIC"/> <!-- MaxOfAcName AS STRING --> <variable comment="Variable for OFFICE name with maximal average in any region" enabled="yes" name="MaxOfAcName" type="STRING"/> <!-- MaxOfAcValue AS NUMERIC --> <variable comment="Variable for maximal average value in any region" enabled="yes" name="MaxOfAcValue" type="NUMERIC"/> <!-- MaxOffice AS STRING --> <variable comment="Variable for OFFICE name with maximal average in all regions" enabled="yes" name="MaxOffice" type="STRING"/> <!-- MaxAverage AS NUMERIC --> <variable comment="Variable for maximal average value in all regions" enabled="yes" name="MaxAverage" type="NUMERIC"/> </variables> <data_sources/> <options> <!-- DATE_FORMAT = M/D/YYYY --> <option displayvalue="M/D/YYYY" name="DATE_FORMAT" value=""/> <!-- NUMERIC_FORMAT = -#,###.## --> <option displayvalue="-#,###.##" name="NUMERIC_FORMAT" value=""/> <!-- FILE_ENCODING = UTF-8 --> <option displayvalue="UTF-8" name="FILE_ENCODING" value="UTF-8"/> <!-- GENLEVEL = APPLICATION --> <option displayvalue="APPLICATION" name="GENLEVEL" value="APPLICATION"/> <!-- NO_VALUE = ERROR --> <option displayvalue="ERROR" name="NO_VALUE" value="ERROR"/> </options> </declarations> <cases> <!-- ON_START REPORT --> <case id="100023" name="report" type="start"> <block> <!-- COMMENT --> <statement enabled="yes" id="4137044" type="comment"> <comment>This demo explains a simple Rule Procedure that takes an input file from VDR and calculates average of each account under it. Post which rule procedure identifies the maximum average of all the accounts listed.</comment> </statement> <!-- COMMENT --> <statement enabled="yes" id="4137045" type="comment"> <comment>Initial assignments</comment> </statement> <!-- MaxAverage = 0 --> <statement comment="Initial value" enabled="yes" id="4137046" type="assignment"> <var name="MaxAverage">0</var> </statement> </block> </case> <!-- ON_START REGION --> <case field="REGION" id="100026" name="field" type="start"> <block> <!-- MaxOfAcValue = 0 --> <statement comment="Initial value" enabled="yes" id="4137047" type="assignment"> <var name="MaxOfAcValue">0</var> </statement> </block> </case> <!-- ON_START OFFICE --> <case field="OFFICE" id="100027" name="field" type="start"> <block> <!-- AccountNum = 0 --> <statement comment="Initial value" enabled="yes" id="4137048" type="assignment"> <var name="AccountNum">0</var> </statement> <!-- TotalAMTD = 0 --> <statement comment="Initial value" enabled="yes" id="4137049" type="assignment"> <var name="TotalAMTD">0</var> </statement> </block> </case> <!-- ON_START ACCOUNT --> <case field="ACCOUNT" id="100028" name="field" type="start"> <block> <!-- AccountNum = AccountNum +1 --> <statement comment="Increase accounts number" enabled="yes" id="4137050" type="assignment"> <var name="AccountNum">AccountNum +1</var> </statement> </block> </case> <!-- ON_EACH RECORD --> <case id="100025" name="record" type="each"> <block> <!-- TotalAMTD = TotalAMTD + AMTD --> <statement comment="Calculate office total AMTD" enabled="yes" id="4137051" type="assignment"> <var name="TotalAMTD">TotalAMTD + AMTD</var> </statement> </block> </case> <!-- ON_END OFFICE --> <case field="OFFICE" id="100029" name="field" type="end"> <block> <!-- AvAMTD = TotalAMTD / AccountNum --> <statement comment="Calculate average" enabled="yes" id="4137052" type="assignment"> <var name="AvAMTD">TotalAMTD / AccountNum</var> </statement> <!-- PRINTLOG ( "Office: "+OFFICE+" ; Average: "+ AvAMTD ) --> <statement comment="Print to log" enabled="yes" id="4137053" type="printlog"> <printlog>"Office: "+OFFICE+" ; Average: "+ AvAMTD</printlog> </statement> <!-- IF AvAMTD > MaxOfAcValue --> <statement comment="Get maximal average in each office" enabled="yes" id="4137054" type="condition"> <if>AvAMTD > MaxOfAcValue</if> <conditionitems> <conditionitem andor="" comparison=">" lexpression="AvAMTD" lparen="" not="" rexpression="MaxOfAcValue" rparen=""/> </conditionitems> <then> <block> <!-- MaxOfAcValue = AvAMTD --> <statement enabled="yes" id="4137055" type="assignment"> <var name="MaxOfAcValue">AvAMTD</var> </statement> <!-- MaxOfAcName = OFFICE --> <statement enabled="yes" id="4137056" type="assignment"> <var name="MaxOfAcName">OFFICE</var> </statement> </block> </then> <else/> </statement> <!-- IF AvAMTD > MaxAverage --> <statement comment="Get maximal average in all offices" enabled="yes" id="4137057" type="condition"> <if>AvAMTD > MaxAverage</if> <conditionitems> <conditionitem andor="" comparison=">" lexpression="AvAMTD" lparen="" not="" rexpression="MaxAverage" rparen=""/> </conditionitems> <then> <block> <!-- MaxOffice = OFFICE --> <statement enabled="yes" id="4137058" type="assignment"> <var name="MaxOffice">OFFICE</var> </statement> <!-- MaxAverage = AvAMTD --> <statement enabled="yes" id="4137059" type="assignment"> <var name="MaxAverage">AvAMTD</var> </statement> </block> </then> <else/> </statement> </block> </case> <!-- ON_END REGION --> <case field="REGION" id="100030" name="field" type="end"> <block> <!-- PRINTLOG ( "Region " + REGION+". Max average is " + MaxOfAcValue +" for office " + MaxOfAcName ) --> <statement comment="Print information for the office with maximal average." enabled="yes" id="4137060" type="printlog"> <printlog>"Region " + REGION+". Max average is " + MaxOfAcValue +" for office " + MaxOfAcName</printlog> </statement> </block> </case> <!-- ON_END REPORT --> <case id="100024" name="report" type="end"> <block> <!-- PRINTLOG ( "Max average is " + MaxAverage+" for office " + MaxOffice ) --> <statement enabled="yes" id="4137061" type="printlog"> <printlog>"Max average is " + MaxAverage+" for office " + MaxOffice</printlog> </statement> </block> </case> </cases> </procedure>

BalancingItem.name: VDR_DataSourceSample2
BalancingItem.description:
This demo explains a simple Rule Procedure that takes an input file from VDR and verifies if AMTD is more than PMTD, if YES throws `Error in account` message. Also stores and Retrieves the office total and Region total.
Apart from that, WRITETOPICITEM command is used, which will write topics into VDR database.
BalancingItem.XMLProcedure: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <procedure name="/MobiusArchiving/VDR_DataSourceSample2" rpname="ABS_Sample2" type="brp" uuid="e21073-f08a474203-db0d60703c5ad5cf1c637ff206026b7c"> <declarations> <fields comment=""> <!-- REGION AS STRING --> <field group="" keyfield="yes" level="1" name="REGION" type="STRING"/> <!-- OFFICE AS STRING --> <field group="" keyfield="yes" level="2" name="OFFICE" type="STRING"/> <!-- ACCOUNT AS STRING --> <field group="" keyfield="yes" level="3" name="ACCOUNT" type="STRING"/> <!-- AMTD AS NUMERIC --> <field group="" level="3" name="AMTD" type="NUMERIC"/> <!-- PMTD AS NUMERIC --> <field group="" level="3" name="PMTD" type="NUMERIC"/> </fields> <variables> <!-- OFF_TOT AS NUMERIC --> <variable comment="Total for office" enabled="yes" name="OFF_TOT" type="NUMERIC"/> <!-- REG_TOT AS NUMERIC --> <variable comment="Total for region" enabled="yes" name="REG_TOT" type="NUMERIC"/> <!-- MESSAGE AS STRING --> <variable comment="Message" enabled="yes" name="MESSAGE" type="STRING"/> <!-- REG_TOT_RETR AS NUMERIC --> <variable comment="Variable for retrieving of total for region" enabled="yes" name="REG_TOT_RETR" type="NUMERIC"/> <!-- OFF_TOT_RETR AS NUMERIC --> <variable comment="Variable for retrieving of total for office" enabled="yes" name="OFF_TOT_RETR" type="NUMERIC"/> </variables> <data_sources/> <options> <!-- DATE_FORMAT = M/D/YYYY --> <option displayvalue="M/D/YYYY" name="DATE_FORMAT" value=""/> <!-- NUMERIC_FORMAT = -#,###.## --> <option displayvalue="-#,###.##" name="NUMERIC_FORMAT" value=""/> <!-- FILE_ENCODING = UTF-8 --> <option displayvalue="UTF-8" name="FILE_ENCODING" value="UTF-8"/> <!-- GENLEVEL = APPLICATION --> <option displayvalue="APPLICATION" name="GENLEVEL" value="APPLICATION"/> <!-- NO_VALUE = ERROR --> <option displayvalue="ERROR" name="NO_VALUE" value="ERROR"/> </options> </declarations> <cases> <!-- ON_START REPORT --> <case id="100031" name="report" type="start"> <block> <!-- COMMENT --> <statement enabled="yes" id="4137290" type="comment"> <comment>This demo explains a simple Rule Procedure that takes an input file from VDR and verifies if AMTD is more than PMTD, if YES throws "Error in account" message. Also stores and Retrieves the office total and Region total.</comment> </statement> <!-- PRINTLOG ( "Report processing is started" ) --> <statement comment="Start of the report" enabled="yes" id="4137291" type="printlog"> <printlog>"Report processing is started"</printlog> </statement> </block> </case> <!-- ON_START REGION --> <case field="REGION" id="100034" name="field" type="start"> <block> <!-- COMMENT --> <statement enabled="yes" id="4137292" type="comment"> <comment>Initial assignment</comment> </statement> <!-- REG_TOT = 0 --> <statement comment="Initial value" enabled="yes" id="4137293" type="assignment"> <var name="REG_TOT">0</var> </statement> <!-- WRITETOPICITEM ( REGION , REGION , Current Page ) --> <statement comment="Adding topic items demo" enabled="yes" id="4137294" type="writetopic"> <topic name="REGION" scope="Current Page">REGION</topic> </statement> </block> </case> <!-- ON_START OFFICE --> <case field="OFFICE" id="100035" name="field" type="start"> <block> <!-- COMMENT --> <statement enabled="yes" id="4137295" type="comment"> <comment>Initial assignment</comment> </statement> <!-- OFF_TOT = 0 --> <statement comment="Initial value" enabled="yes" id="4137296" type="assignment"> <var name="OFF_TOT">0</var> </statement> </block> </case> <!-- ON_EACH RECORD --> <case id="100033" name="record" type="each"> <block> <!-- COMMENT --> <statement enabled="yes" id="4137297" type="comment"> <comment>Verify if the account has AMTD and PMTD both</comment> </statement> <!-- IF AMTD < 0 OR PMTD < 0 --> <statement comment="Verify if AMTD < 0 or PMTD < 0" enabled="yes" id="4137298" type="condition"> <if>AMTD < 0 OR PMTD < 0</if> <conditionitems> <conditionitem andor="OR" comparison="<" lexpression="AMTD" lparen="" not="" rexpression="0" rparen=""/> <conditionitem andor="" comparison="<" lexpression="PMTD" lparen="" not="" rexpression="0" rparen=""/> </conditionitems> <then> <block> <!-- BREAK --> <statement enabled="yes" id="4137299" type="break"/> </block> </then> <else/> </statement> <!-- COMMENT --> <statement enabled="yes" id="4137300" type="comment"> <comment>IF AMTD is more then PMTD it means that there are error for the account.</comment> </statement> <!-- IF AMTD > PMTD --> <statement comment="Verify if AMTD > PMTD" enabled="yes" id="4137301" type="condition"> <if>AMTD > PMTD</if> <conditionitems> <conditionitem andor="" comparison=">" lexpression="AMTD" lparen="" not="" rexpression="PMTD" rparen=""/> </conditionitems> <then> <block> <!-- MESSAGE = "Error in account " + ACCOUNT + ". BalancingItem.name: VDR_DataSourceSample3
BalancingItem.description:
This demo explains a simple Rule Procedure that takes an input file from VDR and does the below list of steps for each account,
1. Get the list of accounts with AMTD>PMTD. 2. For each account with AMTD>PMTD prints the difference between AMTD and PMTD 3. Get percent of accounts with AMTD>PMTD. 4. Get average (AMTD-PMTD) for all accounts with AMTD>PMTD

Application.name: ASCIIDataSource
Application.description:
This application demonstrates working with ASCII Data Source. It processes ASCII file as input and does the below list of steps for each account,
1. Get the list of accounts with AMTD>PMTD. 2. For each account with AMTD>PMTD prints the difference between AMTD and PMTD 3. Get percent of accounts with AMTD>PMTD. 4. Get average (AMTD-PMTD) for all accounts with AMTD>PMTD

Application.name: ApplStRet01

BalancingItem.name: AC001
BalancingItem.description:
This demo explains a simple Rule Procedure that uses STORE / RETRIEVE command to process the user requests. This demo will focus on 3 main use cases as described below,
1) RETRIEVE - GENLEVEL options 2) RETRIEVE from cycle with gaps considerations 3) RETRIEVE from this run only

BalancingItem.name: BIretr01
BalancingItem.description:
This demo explains a simple Rule Procedure that uses STORE / RETRIEVE command to process the user requests. This demo will focus on 3 main use cases as described below,
1) RETRIEVE - GENLEVEL options 2) RETRIEVE from cycle with gaps considerations 3) RETRIEVE from this run only

BalancingItem.name: SL001
BalancingItem.description:
This demo explains a simple Rule Procedure that uses STORE / RETRIEVE command to process the user requests. This demo will focus on 3 main use cases as described below,
1) RETRIEVE - GENLEVEL options 2) RETRIEVE from cycle with gaps considerations 3) RETRIEVE from this run only

Privilege.name: Enable Edit Redactions for Conversion Item

Application.name: MobiusDataSource
Application.description: This application explains a simple Rule Procedure that aims to download all the reports and topics from all archive repositories configured in Audit and Analytics Services, with the ability to limit the amount of downloaded information.

BalancingItem.name: Download_Archive
BalancingItem.description: This demo explains a simple Rule Procedure that aims to download all the reports and topics from all archive repositories configured in Audit and Analytics Services, with the ability to limit the amount of downloaded information.

Application.name: BasicApplication
Application.description: This application demonstrates the basic functionalities of the Audit and Analytics Services

BalancingItem.name: BalancingTask
BalancingItem.description: This demo explains a simple Rule Procedure that extracts data from report and verifies if sum of ACTUAL MTD values matches to value of TOTAL ACTUAL MTD.
BalancingItem.XMLProcedure: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <procedure autoDownload="false" downloadIntermediate="false" name="/BasicApplication/BalancingTask" primarydsv="ViewDirectReportDSV" rpname="BalancingRP" scriptPath="null" type="dsrp" uuid="6009bea-16eacaee307-00ef7662b53dc0f0afa8e8adbe1fdfa3" writeToDatabase="false" zipResults="false"> </fields> </common> </dataprovider> </definition> <definitionphysical><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <dataprovider is_auto_download="false" is_input="false" is_output="false" name="VP Source"> <specific> <policy_name>/home/mobius/Samples/1-Balancing_Rule_Procedure_Demo/DATA/AC001_POLICY.PLC</policy_name> <policy_file>/home/mobius/Samples/1-Balancing_Rule_Procedure_Demo/DATA/AC001page.rpt</policy_file> <fields> <field name="ACT_TOTAL" type="NUMERIC"/> <field name="ACT_DETAILS" type="NUMERIC"/> </fields> <sorted>false</sorted> <sorted>false</sorted> </specific> </dataprovider> </definitionphysical> <redaction><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?> <RedactionRules/> </redaction> <definitioninfo> <dataprovider name="VP Source"> <common> <fields> <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="ACT_DETAILS" order="2" type="NUMERIC"/> <field isenabled="1" iskey="1" isvisible="1" name="ACT_TOTAL" order="1" type="NUMERIC"/> </fields> </common> </dataprovider> </definitioninfo> </data_source> </data_sources> <options> <!-- DATE_FORMAT = M/D/YYYY --> <option displayvalue="M/D/YYYY" name="DATE_FORMAT" value=""/> <!-- NUMERIC_FORMAT = -#,###.## --> <option displayvalue="-#,###.##" name="NUMERIC_FORMAT" value=""/> <!-- FILE_ENCODING = UTF-8 --> <option displayvalue="UTF-8" name="FILE_ENCODING" value="UTF-8"/> <!-- GENLEVEL = APPLICATION --> <option displayvalue="APPLICATION" name="GENLEVEL" value="APPLICATION"/> <!-- NO_VALUE = ERROR --> <option displayvalue="ERROR" name="NO_VALUE" value="ERROR"/> </options> </declarations> <cases> <!-- ON_START REPORT --> <case id="100144" name="report" type="start"> <block/> </case> <!-- ON_START ACT_TOTAL --> <case field="ACT_TOTAL" id="100147" name="field" type="start"> <block> <!-- ACT_TOTAL_num = ACT_TOTAL --> <statement enabled="yes" id="11329" type="assignment"> <var name="ACT_TOTAL_num">ACT_TOTAL</var> </statement> </block> </case> <!-- ON_EACH RECORD --> <case id="100146" name="record" type="each"> <block> <!-- ACT_DETAILS_sum = ACT_DETAILS_sum + ACT_DETAILS --> <statement enabled="yes" id="11330" type="assignment"> <var name="ACT_DETAILS_sum">ACT_DETAILS_sum + ACT_DETAILS</var> </statement> </block> </case> <!-- ON_END ACT_TOTAL --> <case field="ACT_TOTAL" id="100148" name="field" type="end"> <block/> </case> <!-- ON_END REPORT --> <case id="100145" name="report" type="end"> <block> <!-- PRINTLOG ( "ACT_DETAILS: " + ACT_DETAILS_sum + " ACT_TOTAL: " + ACT_TOTAL_num ) --> <statement enabled="yes" id="11331" type="printlog"> <printlog>"ACT_DETAILS: " + ACT_DETAILS_sum + " ACT_TOTAL: " + ACT_TOTAL_num</printlog> </statement> <!-- IF ACT_DETAILS_sum = ACT_TOTAL_num --> <statement enabled="yes" id="11332" type="condition"> <if>ACT_DETAILS_sum = ACT_TOTAL_num</if> <conditionitems> <conditionitem andor="" comparison="=" lexpression="ACT_DETAILS_sum" lparen="" not="" rexpression="ACT_TOTAL_num" rparen=""/> </conditionitems> <then> <block> <!-- RETURN SUCCESS , "BALANCED" , Approved --> <statement enabled="yes" id="11333" type="return"> <return code="0" error_message=""BALANCED"" status="1"/> </statement> </block> </then> <else> <block> <!-- RETURN ERROR , "NOT BALANCED" , Rejected --> <statement enabled="yes" id="11334" type="return"> <return code="12" error_message=""NOT BALANCED"" status="2"/> </statement> </block> </else> </statement> </block> </case> </cases> </procedure>

                    </dataprovider>
                    </definition>
                    <definitionphysical><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
                    <dataprovider is_auto_download="false" is_input="false" is_output="false" name="ASCII files">
                    <common>
                    <fields>
                    <field name="AMOUNT_TRANSLIST" order="3" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    <field name="AMOUNT_STATEMENT" order="2" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    <field name="TRNUM" order="1" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    </fields>
                    </common>
                    <specific>
                    <file name="/home/mobius/DATA/UNMATCHED.out.txt" overwrite="false"/>
                    <tolerance converting_option="0" log_entry="true" name="" use_err_file="false">
                    <skip_line>#</skip_line>
                    <skip_line>&amp;&amp;</skip_line>
                    </tolerance>
                    <sorted>false</sorted>
                    <format delimiter="{tab}" escape="0" qualifier="{none}" type="Delimited" use_header="false"/>
                    <columns>
                    <column position="3" width="0"/>
                    <column position="2" width="0"/>
                    <column position="1" width="0"/>
                    </columns>
                    </specific>
                    </dataprovider>
                    </definitionphysical>
                    <redaction><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
                    <RedactionRules/>
                    </redaction>
                    <definitioninfo>
                    <dataprovider name="ASCII files">
                    <common>
                    <fields>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="AMOUNT_TRANSLIST" order="3" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="AMOUNT_STATEMENT" order="2" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="TRNUM" order="1" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    </fields>
                    </common>
                    </dataprovider>
                    </definitioninfo>
                    </data_source>
                    <!-- REMAINDER_OUT AS ASCII file -->
                    <data_source comment="Current month uncleared checks will be stored here" dsdname="ASCII files" enabled="yes" is_auto_download="false" is_input="false" is_output="false" name="REMAINDER_OUT" type="DSV">
                    <definition><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
                    <dataprovider name="">
                    <common>
                    <fields>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="AMOUNT" order="4" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="PAYEE" order="3" type="STRING"/>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="TRDATE" order="2" type="DATE"/>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="1" isvisible="1" name="TRNUM" order="1" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    </fields>
                    </common>
                    </dataprovider>
                    </definition>
                    <definitionphysical><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
                    <dataprovider is_auto_download="false" is_input="false" is_output="false" name="ASCII files">
                    <common>
                    <fields>
                    <field name="AMOUNT" order="4" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    <field name="PAYEE" order="3" type="STRING"/>
                    <field name="TRDATE" order="2" type="DATE"/>
                    <field name="TRNUM" order="1" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    </fields>
                    </common>
                    <specific>
                    <file name="/home/mobius/DATA/REMAINDER.out.txt" overwrite="false"/>
                    <tolerance converting_option="0" log_entry="true" name="" use_err_file="false">
                    <skip_line>#</skip_line>
                    <skip_line>&amp;&amp;</skip_line>
                    </tolerance>
                    <sorted>false</sorted>
                    <format delimiter=";(semicolon)" escape="0" qualifier="{none}" type="Delimited" use_header="false"/>
                    <columns>
                    <column position="4" width="0"/>
                    <column position="3" width="0"/>
                    <column position="2" width="0"/>
                    <column position="1" width="0"/>
                    </columns>
                    </specific>
                    </dataprovider>
                    </definitionphysical>
                    <redaction><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
                    <RedactionRules/>
                    </redaction>
                    <definitioninfo>
                    <dataprovider name="ASCII files">
                    <common>
                    <fields>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="AMOUNT" order="4" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="PAYEE" order="3" type="STRING"/>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="TRDATE" order="2" type="DATE"/>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="1" isvisible="1" name="TRNUM" order="1" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    </fields>
                    </common>
                    </dataprovider>
                    </definitioninfo>
                    </data_source>
                    </data_sources>
                    <options>
                    <!-- DATE_FORMAT  =  M/D/YYYY -->
                    <option displayvalue="M/D/YYYY" name="DATE_FORMAT" value=""/>
                    <!-- NUMERIC_FORMAT  =  -#,###.## -->
                    <option displayvalue="-#,###.##" name="NUMERIC_FORMAT" value=""/>
                    <!-- FILE_ENCODING  =  UTF-8 -->
                    <option displayvalue="UTF-8" name="FILE_ENCODING" value="UTF-8"/>
                    <!-- GENLEVEL  =  APPLICATION -->
                    <option displayvalue="APPLICATION" name="GENLEVEL" value="APPLICATION"/>
                    <!-- NO_VALUE  =  ERROR -->
                    <option displayvalue="ERROR" name="NO_VALUE" value="ERROR"/>
                    </options>
                    </declarations>
                    <cases>
                    <!-- ON_START -->
                    <case id="100149" name="rrp" type="start">
                    <block>
                    <!-- COMMENT -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="620312" type="comment">
                    <comment>Data source files  : Register.txt, Statement.txt, Remainder.txt          
                    Main idea of the test: Reconcile checkbook register against bank statement. There may be unmatched transactions left prom previous month; they are combined with current months register. Register is aggregated by transaction number and filtered to exclude invalid or empty transactions. Records which are in register but not in statement are left for the next month reconciliation; records which are in statement but not in register are reported as unregistered. Amounts of matched records in register and statement are verified to be identical, if they are not identical - email to ABS admin is sent. At the end, there should not be unmatched transactions and unmatched amounts.</comment>
                    </statement>
                    <!-- PRINTLOG  ( "Data source files  : Register.txt, Statement.txt, Remainder.txt" ) -->
                    <statement comment="Data source files used in the test" enabled="yes" id="620313" type="printlog">
                    <printlog>"Data source files  : Register.txt, Statement.txt, Remainder.txt"</printlog>
                    </statement>
                    <!-- DELETE UNMATCHED_OUT -->
                    <statement comment="We will  WRITE to unmatched file, so make sure we are not appending to leftover from previous run" enabled="yes" id="620314" type="delete">
                    <target name="UNMATCHED_OUT"/>
                    <where manual_query="false"/>
                    <conditionitems/>
                    </statement>
                    <!-- UNMATCHED_TRANSACTIONS = 0 -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="620315" type="assignment">
                    <var name="UNMATCHED_TRANSACTIONS">0</var>
                    </statement>
                    <!-- UNMATCHED_AMOUNT = 0 -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="620316" type="assignment">
                    <var name="UNMATCHED_AMOUNT">0</var>
                    </statement>
                    <!-- STATEMENT_TOTAL = 0 -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="620317" type="assignment">
                    <var name="STATEMENT_TOTAL">0</var>
                    </statement>
                    <!-- REGISTER_TOTAL = 0 -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="620318" type="assignment">
                    <var name="REGISTER_TOTAL">0</var>
                    </statement>
                    <!-- TRANSLIST  =  APPEND REGISTER ,  REMAINDER -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="620319" type="append" usedatabase="no">
                    <target name="TRANSLIST"/>
                    <dsvitem dsvname="REGISTER"/>
                    <dsvitem dsvname="REMAINDER"/>
                    </statement>
                    <!-- TRANSLIST  =  FILTER TRANSLIST , TRANSLIST.PAYEE <> "VOID"  AND  TRANSLIST.AMOUNT <> 0 -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="620320" type="filter" usedatabase="no">
                    <target name="TRANSLIST"/>
                    <dsvitem dsvname="TRANSLIST"/>
                    <expression>TRANSLIST.PAYEE <> "VOID"  AND  TRANSLIST.AMOUNT <> 0</expression>
                    <conditionitems>
                    <conditionitem andor="AND" comparison="<>" lexpression="TRANSLIST.PAYEE" lparen="" not="" rexpression=""VOID"" rparen=""/>
                    <conditionitem andor="" comparison="<>" lexpression="TRANSLIST.AMOUNT" lparen="" not="" rexpression="0" rparen=""/>
                    </conditionitems>
                    </statement>
                    <!-- TRANSLIST  =  AGGREGATE TRANSLIST -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="620321" type="aggregate" usedatabase="no">
                    <target name="TRANSLIST"/>
                    <dsvitem dsvname="TRANSLIST"/>
                    </statement>
                    </block>
                    </case>
                    <!-- RECONCILE STATEMENT ( TRNUM ) ,  TRANSLIST ( TRNUM ) -->
                    <case id="100150" name="rrp" sparkreconcile="false" type="reconcile">
                    <reconcileitems>
                    <dsvitem dsvname="STATEMENT">
                    <dsvfield name="TRNUM"/>
                    </dsvitem>
                    <dsvitem dsvname="TRANSLIST">
                    <dsvfield name="TRNUM"/>
                    </dsvitem>
                    </reconcileitems>
                    <block>
                    <!-- COMMENT -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="620322" type="comment">
                    <comment>Example illustrating the code which will be executed for every record, regardless of the fact whether match is found or not. Present example mimics balancing against itself, in addition, it is rather self-confident - TRANSLIST may be in non-matched state for at least one record, which will cause run-time exception</comment>
                    </statement>
                    <!-- IF TRANSLIST.AMOUNT > 1000000 -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="620323" type="condition">
                    <if>TRANSLIST.AMOUNT > 1000000</if>
                    <conditionitems>
                    <conditionitem andor="" comparison=">" lexpression="TRANSLIST.AMOUNT" lparen="" not="" rexpression="1000000" rparen=""/>
                    </conditionitems>
                    <then>
                    <block>
                    <!-- MESSAGE = "Transaction " + TRANSLIST.TRNUM + " is too big: " + TRANSLIST.AMOUNT -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="620324" type="assignment">
                    <var name="MESSAGE">"Transaction " + TRANSLIST.TRNUM + " is too big: " + TRANSLIST.AMOUNT</var>
                    </statement>
                    <!-- PRINTLOG  ( MESSAGE ) -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="620325" type="printlog">
                    <printlog>MESSAGE</printlog>
                    </statement>
                    <!-- SENDMAIL  ( recipient="XXX@XXX.XXX", cc= , bcc= , attachments= , subject="This is test message, send by O1P04.Reconcile4Checkbook test case", body=MESSAGE ) -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="620326" type="action">
                    <provider name="SENDMAIL"/>
                    <parameters>
                    <param name="body">MESSAGE</param>
                    <param name="subject">"This is test message, send by O1P04.Reconcile4Checkbook test case"</param>
                    <param name="recipient">"XXX@XXX.XXX"</param>
                    </parameters>
                    </statement>
                    </block>
                    </then>
                    <else/>
                    </statement>
                    </block>
                    <case id="100153" name="reconcile_field" type="start">
                    <block/>
                    </case>
                    <case id="100151" name="matched" type="reconcile">
                    <block>
                    <!-- STATEMENT_TOTAL = STATEMENT_TOTAL+1 -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="14" type="assignment">
                    <var name="STATEMENT_TOTAL">STATEMENT_TOTAL+1</var>
                    </statement>
                    <!-- REGISTER_TOTAL = REGISTER_TOTAL+1 -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="15" type="assignment">
                    <var name="REGISTER_TOTAL">REGISTER_TOTAL+1</var>
                    </statement>
                    <!-- IF TRANSLIST.AMOUNT <> STATEMENT.AMOUNT -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="16" type="condition">
                    <if>TRANSLIST.AMOUNT <> STATEMENT.AMOUNT</if>
                    <conditionitems>
                    <conditionitem andor="" comparison="<>" lexpression="TRANSLIST.AMOUNT" lparen="" not="" rexpression="STATEMENT.AMOUNT" rparen=""/>
                    </conditionitems>
                    <then>
                    <block>
                    <!-- PRINTLOG  ( "Transactions amounts for transaction "+TRANSLIST.TRNUM+" do not match" ) -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="17" type="printlog">
                    <printlog>"Transactions amounts for transaction "+TRANSLIST.TRNUM+" do not match"</printlog>
                    </statement>
                    <!-- WRITE  ( UNMATCHED_OUT  , TRANSLIST.TRNUM , STATEMENT.AMOUNT , TRANSLIST.AMOUNT ) -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="18" type="write">
                    <DSV>UNMATCHED_OUT</DSV>
                    <writeparameters>
                    <writeparameter>TRANSLIST.TRNUM</writeparameter>
                    <writeparameter>STATEMENT.AMOUNT</writeparameter>
                    <writeparameter>TRANSLIST.AMOUNT</writeparameter>
                    </writeparameters>
                    </statement>
                    <!-- UNMATCHED_AMOUNT = UNMATCHED_AMOUNT+1 -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="19" type="assignment">
                    <var name="UNMATCHED_AMOUNT">UNMATCHED_AMOUNT+1</var>
                    </statement>
                    </block>
                    </then>
                    <else/>
                    </statement>
                    </block>
                    </case>
                    <case id="100152" name="notmatched" type="reconcile">
                    <block>
                    <!-- UNMATCHED_TRANSACTIONS = UNMATCHED_TRANSACTIONS+1 -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="20" type="assignment">
                    <var name="UNMATCHED_TRANSACTIONS">UNMATCHED_TRANSACTIONS+1</var>
                    </statement>
                    <!-- ON MISSING IN TRANSLIST -->
                    <case id="100156" name="onexists" type="reconcile">
                    <conditionitems>
                    <conditionitem andor="" exists="NOT EXISTS" expression="TRANSLIST" lparen="" rparen=""/>
                    </conditionitems>
                    <expression>MISSING IN TRANSLIST</expression>
                    <block>
                    <!-- PRINTLOG  ( "Statement contains unregistered transaction " + STATEMENT.TRNUM + " for the amount of " + STATEMENT.AMOUNT ) -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="21" type="printlog">
                    <printlog>"Statement contains unregistered transaction " + STATEMENT.TRNUM + " for the amount of " + STATEMENT.AMOUNT</printlog>
                    </statement>
                    </block>
                    </case>
                    <!-- ON ( MISSING IN STATEMENT )  AND  ( FOUND IN TRANSLIST ) -->
                    <case id="100157" name="onexists" type="reconcile">
                    <conditionitems>
                    <conditionitem andor="AND" exists="NOT EXISTS" expression="STATEMENT" lparen="(" rparen=")"/>
                    <conditionitem andor="" exists="EXISTS" expression="TRANSLIST" lparen="(" rparen=")"/>
                    </conditionitems>
                    <expression>( MISSING IN STATEMENT )  AND  ( FOUND IN TRANSLIST )</expression>
                    <block>
                    <!-- WRITE  ( NEWREMAINDER  , TRANSLIST.TRNUM , TRANSLIST.TRDATE , TRANSLIST.PAYEE , TRANSLIST.AMOUNT ) -->
                    <statement comment="Second part of condition is senseless since we are reconciling only two datasources, but included to demonstrate complex conditions" enabled="yes" id="22" type="write">
                    <DSV>NEWREMAINDER</DSV>
                    <writeparameters>
                    <writeparameter>TRANSLIST.TRNUM</writeparameter>
                    <writeparameter>TRANSLIST.TRDATE</writeparameter>
                    <writeparameter>TRANSLIST.PAYEE</writeparameter>
                    <writeparameter>TRANSLIST.AMOUNT</writeparameter>
                    </writeparameters>
                    </statement>
                    </block>
                    </case>
                    </block>
                    </case>
                    <case id="100154" name="reconcile_field" type="end">
                    <block/>
                    </case>
                    </case>
                    <!-- ON_END -->
                    <case id="100155" name="rrp" type="end">
                    <block>
                    <!-- IF UNMATCHED_TRANSACTIONS = 0  AND  UNMATCHED_AMOUNT = 0 -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="620327" type="condition">
                    <if>UNMATCHED_TRANSACTIONS = 0  AND  UNMATCHED_AMOUNT = 0</if>
                    <conditionitems>
                    <conditionitem andor="AND" comparison="=" lexpression="UNMATCHED_TRANSACTIONS" lparen="" not="" rexpression="0" rparen=""/>
                    <conditionitem andor="" comparison="=" lexpression="UNMATCHED_AMOUNT" lparen="" not="" rexpression="0" rparen=""/>
                    </conditionitems>
                    <then>
                    <block>
                    <!-- PRINTLOG  ( "No discrepancies found" ) -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="620328" type="printlog">
                    <printlog>"No discrepancies found"</printlog>
                    </statement>
                    <!-- SAVE NEWREMAINDER IN REMAINDER_OUT OVERWRITE -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="620329" type="save" usedatabase="no">
                    <target name="REMAINDER_OUT"/>
                    <dsvitem dsvname="NEWREMAINDER"/>
                    <overwrite value="yes"/>
                    </statement>
                    <!-- RETURN SUCCESS , "No discrepancies found" -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="620330" type="return">
                    <return code="0" error_message=""No discrepancies found"" status="-1"/>
                    </statement>
                    </block>
                    </then>
                    <else>
                    <block>
                    <!-- PRINTLOG  ( "Number of discrepancies found, please check run log file, correct problems, and rerun the process" ) -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="620331" type="printlog">
                    <printlog>"Number of discrepancies found, please check run log file, correct problems, and rerun the process"</printlog>
                    </statement>
                    <!-- RETURN EXCEPTION , "Number of discrepancies found" -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="620332" type="return">
                    <return code="8" error_message=""Number of discrepancies found"" status="-1"/>
                    </statement>
                    </block>
                    </else>
                    </statement>
                    </block>
                    </case>
                    </cases>
                    </procedure>

BalancingItem.name: ReconciliationTask
BalancingItem.description: This demo explains a simple Rule Procedure that compares a given report with test file and records the results to show a visual representation of the same.

FOUND IN ViewDirectReportDSV AND MISSING IN Rec2 --> <case id="100171" name="onexists" type="reconcile"> <conditionitems> <conditionitem andor="AND" exists="EXISTS" expression="ViewDirectReportDSV" enabled="yes" id="12685" type="printlog"> <printlog>"FOUND IN ViewDirectReportDSV AND MISSING IN Rec2 ==> ACCOUNT_CODE: " + ViewDirectReportDSV.ACCOUNT_CODE + " ACTUAL_MTD: " + Privilege.name: Enable Edit Redactions for Conversion Item
Convert Reconciliation Item to Conversion Item
Enable Edit Redactions for Reconciliation Item
Run Reconciliation Rule Procedures for Approved Item
Convert Balancing Item to Conversion Item

Application.name: ApplTotal
Application.description: This Application demonstrates how to STORE/RETRIEVE data using AAS Control Database Variables. It also demonstrate programmatic CYCLE advancement. We provide sample Rule Procedures that stores monthly data for a given year. At the end of the year, it fetches the monthly data of the corresponding year, sums and writes this information into a file.

BalancingItem.name: BiAdvanceCycle
BalancingItem.description: `BiAdvanceCycle` task used to advance cycle. Runs every month. `BiMonthlyStoreTotal` task used to store totals to CDB for each month. `BiRetrieveCalculateTotals` task retrieves stored total at the end of each year.
BalancingItem.XMLProcedure: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <procedure autoDownload="false" downloadIntermediate="false" name="/ApplTotal/BiAdvanceCycle" primarydsv="" rpname="AdvanceCycleRP" scriptPath="" type="dsrp" uuid="6009bea-16eacaee90c-00ef7662b53dc0f0afa8e8adbe1fdfa3" writeToDatabase="false" zipResults="false"> <declarations> <parameters/> <fields comment=""/> <variables/> <data_sources/> <options> <!-- DATE_FORMAT = M/D/YYYY --> <option displayvalue="M/D/YYYY" name="DATE_FORMAT" value=""/> <!-- NUMERIC_FORMAT = -#,###.## --> <option displayvalue="-#,###.##" name="NUMERIC_FORMAT" value=""/> <!-- FILE_ENCODING = UTF-8 --> <option displayvalue="UTF-8" name="FILE_ENCODING" value="UTF-8"/> <!-- GENLEVEL = APPLICATION --> <option displayvalue="APPLICATION" name="GENLEVEL" value="APPLICATION"/> <!-- NO_VALUE = ERROR --> <option displayvalue="ERROR" name="NO_VALUE" value="ERROR"/> </options> </declarations> <cases> <!-- ON_START REPORT --> <case id="100179" name="report" type="start"> <block> <!-- PRINTLOG ( "Current cycle: " + CURRENT_CYCLE ) --> <statement enabled="yes" id="15706" type="printlog"> <printlog>"Current cycle: " + CURRENT_CYCLE</printlog> </statement> <!-- APPLICATION_CYCLE = CURRENT_CYCLE(1) --> <statement enabled="yes" id="15707" type="assignment"> <var name="APPLICATION_CYCLE">CURRENT_CYCLE(1)</var> </statement> <!-- PRINTLOG ( "New cycle: " + APPLICATION_CYCLE ) --> <statement enabled="yes" id="15708" type="printlog"> <printlog>"New cycle: " + APPLICATION_CYCLE</printlog> </statement> </block> </case> <!-- ON_EACH RECORD --> <case id="100181" name="record" type="each"> <block/> </case> <!-- ON_END REPORT --> <case id="100180" name="report" type="end"> <block> <!-- RETURN SUCCESS , "Cycle is advanced" , Pending --> <statement enabled="yes" id="15709" type="return"> <return code="0" error_message=""Cycle is advanced"" status="3"/> </statement> </block> </case> </cases> </procedure>

BalancingItem.name: BiMonthlyStoreTotal
BalancingItem.description: BiAdvanceCycle task used to advance cycle. Runs every month. BiMonthlyStoreTotal task used to store totals to CDB for each month. BiRetrieveCalculateTotals task retrieves stored total at the end of each year.

Application.name: WebService_Samples

BalancingItem.name: Test_Advanced_WS
BalancingItem.description: Procedure accepts two parameters and returns back output data source. Demonstrates advanced web service. This task will be called from Java Standalone client, .NET Standalone Client and MS OFFICE Addin.
BalancingItem.XMLProcedure:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
                    <procedure autoDownload="false" downloadIntermediate="false" name="/WebService_Samples/Test_Advanced_WS" primarydsv="" rpname="Test_Advanced_WS" scriptPath="null" type="dsrp" uuid="6009bea-16eacaeea39-00ef7662b53dc0f0afa8e8adbe1fdfa3" writeToDatabase="false" zipResults="false">
                    <declarations>
                    <parameters>
                    <!-- P1 AS STRING -->
                    <parameter displayname="P1" enabled="yes" name="P1" type="STRING"/>
                    <!-- P2 AS NUMERIC -->
                    <parameter displayname="P2" enabled="yes" name="P2" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    </parameters>
                    <fields comment=""/>
                    <variables/>
                    <data_sources>
                    <!-- [WS Output] OutputDS AS ASCII file -->
                    <data_source dsdname="ASCII files" enabled="yes" is_auto_download="false" is_input="false" is_output="true" name="OutputDS" type="DSV">
                    <definition><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
                    <dataprovider name="">
                    <common>
                    <fields>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="F2" order="2" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="F1" order="1" type="STRING"/>
                    </fields>
                    </common>
                    </dataprovider>
                    </definition>
                    <definitionphysical><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
                    <dataprovider is_auto_download="false" is_input="false" is_output="true" name="ASCII files">
                    <common>
                    <fields>
                    <field name="F2" order="2" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    <field name="F1" order="1" type="STRING"/>
                    </fields>
                    </common>
                    <specific>
                    <file name="c:\\temp\\AdvancedWSData\\outfile.txt" overwrite="true"/>
                    <tolerance converting_option="0" log_entry="false" name="" use_err_file="false">
                    <skip_line>#</skip_line>
                    <skip_line>&amp;&amp;</skip_line>
                    </tolerance>
                    <sorted>false</sorted>
                    <format delimiter=",(comma)" escape="0" qualifier="{none}" type="Delimited" use_header="false"/>
                    <columns>
                    <column position="2" width="0"/>
                    <column position="1" width="0"/>
                    </columns>
                    </specific>
                    </dataprovider>
                    </definitionphysical>
                    <redaction><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
                    <RedactionRules/>
                    </redaction>
                    <definitioninfo>
                    <dataprovider name="ASCII files">
                    <common>
                    <fields>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="F2" order="2" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="F1" order="1" type="STRING"/>
                    </fields>
                    </common>
                    </dataprovider>
                    </definitioninfo>
                    </data_source>
                    </data_sources>
                    <options>
                    <!-- DATE_FORMAT  =  M/D/YYYY -->
                    <option displayvalue="M/D/YYYY" name="DATE_FORMAT" value=""/>
                    <!-- NUMERIC_FORMAT  =  -#,###.## -->
                    <option displayvalue="-#,###.##" name="NUMERIC_FORMAT" value=""/>
                    <!-- FILE_ENCODING  =  UTF-8 -->
                    <option displayvalue="UTF-8" name="FILE_ENCODING" value="UTF-8"/>
                    <!-- GENLEVEL  =  APPLICATION -->
                    <option displayvalue="APPLICATION" name="GENLEVEL" value="APPLICATION"/>
                    <!-- NO_VALUE  =  ERROR -->
                    <option displayvalue="ERROR" name="NO_VALUE" value="ERROR"/>
                    </options>
                    </declarations>
                    <cases>
                    <!-- ON_START REPORT -->
                    <case id="100188" name="report" type="start">
                    <block>
                    <!-- WRITE  ( OutputDS  , P1 , P2 ) -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="616187" type="write">
                    <DSV>OutputDS</DSV>
                    <writeparameters>
                    <writeparameter>P1</writeparameter>
                    <writeparameter>P2</writeparameter>
                    </writeparameters>
                    </statement>
                    </block>
                    </case>
                    <!-- ON_EACH RECORD -->
                    <case id="100190" name="record" type="each">
                    <block/>
                    </case>
                    <!-- ON_END REPORT -->
                    <case id="100189" name="report" type="end">
                    <block/>
                    </case>
                    </cases>
                    </procedure>

<variable enabled="yes" name="transactionID" type="STRING"/> </variables> <data_sources> <!-- Transaction AS ASCII file --> <data_source dsdname="ASCII files" enabled="yes" is_auto_download="false" is_input="false" is_output="false" name="Transaction" type="DSV"> <definition><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <dataprovider name=""> <common> <fields> <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="PremiumAmt" order="5" type="NUMERIC"/> <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="Inception_Date" order="4" type="DATE"/> <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="TFS_Amt" order="3" type="NUMERIC"/> <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="PolicyID" order="2" type="STRING"/> <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="TransactionID" order="1" type="STRING"/> </fields> </common> </dataprovider> </definition> <definitionphysical><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <dataprovider
