<specific> <file name="/home/mobius/Samples/Calling AAS Rest Endpoint/Sample Data/Transaction.csv" overwrite="false"/> <tolerance converting_option="0" log_entry="false" name="" use_err_file="false"> <skip_line>#</skip_line> <skip_line>&amp;&amp;</skip_line> </tolerance> <sorted>false</sorted> <format delimiter=",(comma)" escape="0" qualifier="{none}" type="Delimited" use_header="false"/> <columns> <column position="5" width="0"/> <column position="4" width="0"/> <column position="3" width="0"/> <column position="2" width="0"/> <column position="1" width="0"/> </columns> </specific> </dataprovider> </definitionphysical> <redaction><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?> <RedactionRules/> </redaction> <definitioninfo> <dataprovider name="ASCII files"> <common> <fields> <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="PremiumAmt" order="5" type="NUMERIC"/> <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="Inception_Date" order="4" type="DATE"/> <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="TFS_Amt" order="3" type="NUMERIC"/> <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="PolicyID" order="2" type="STRING"/> <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="TransactionID" order="1" type="STRING"/> </fields> </common> </dataprovider> </definitioninfo> </data_source> </data_sources> <options> <!-- DATE_FORMAT = M/D/YYYY --> <option displayvalue="M/D/YYYY" name="DATE_FORMAT" value=""/> <!-- NUMERIC_FORMAT = -#,###.## --> <option displayvalue="-#,###.##" name="NUMERIC_FORMAT" value=""/> <!-- FILE_ENCODING = UTF-8 --> <option displayvalue="UTF-8" name="FILE_ENCODING" value="UTF-8"/> <!-- GENLEVEL = APPLICATION --> <option displayvalue="APPLICATION" name="GENLEVEL" value="APPLICATION"/> <!-- NO_VALUE = ERROR --> <option displayvalue="ERROR" name="NO_VALUE" value="ERROR"/> </options> </declarations> <cases> <!-- ON_START REPORT --> <case id="100191" name="report" type="start"> <block> <!-- COMMENT --> <statement enabled="yes" id="616416" type="comment"> <comment>This rule procedure will retrieve all the counts from the control totals database, apply the balancing formula and test against the e-mail and paging thresholds. Depending on the results, it will take the necessary action.</comment> </statement> <!-- PRINTLOG ( "SetRerunDateParm = " + SetRerunDateParm ) --> <statement enabled="yes" id="616417" type="printlog"> id="616423" inmemory="no" maxrecords="-1" permanently="no" type="store"> <rpvariable>premiumAmt</rpvariable> <cdbvariable>FIS_PremiumAmt</cdbvariable> <key name="___KEY$$616423" type="KEY"> <keyvars> </key> </statement> <!-- STORE ( tfs_amt , FIS_TFSamt , KEY ( transactionID ) ) --> <statement enabled="yes" id="616424" inmemory="no" maxrecords="-1" permanently="no" type="store"> <rpvariable>tfs_amt</rpvariable> <cdbvariable>FIS_TFSamt</cdbvariable> <key name="___KEY$$616424" type="KEY"> <keyvars> <!-- transactionID AS STRING --> <variable enabled="yes" name="transactionID" --> <statement enabled="yes" id="616425" inmemory="no" maxrecords="-1" permanently="no" type="store"> <rpvariable>policyID</rpvariable> <cdbvariable>FIS_PolicyID</cdbvariable> <key name="___KEY$$616425" type="KEY"> <keyvars> <!-- transactionID AS STRING --> <variable enabled="yes" name="transactionID" type="STRING"/> </keyvars> <keyfields> <variable enabled="yes" inmemory="no" maxrecords="-1" permanently="no" type="store"> <rpvariable>inceptionDate</rpvariable> <cdbvariable>FIS_InceptionDate</cdbvariable> <key name="___KEY$$616426" type="KEY"> <keyvars> <!-- transactionID AS STRING --> <variable enabled="yes" name="transactionID" type="STRING"/> </keyvars> <keyfields> <variable enabled="yes" name="FIS_BusinessCaseID" type="STRING"/> </keyfields> </key> </statement> </block> </case> <!-- ON_END REPORT --> <case id="100192" name="report" type="end"> <block> <!-- RETURN SUCCESS , "Success" , Approved --> <statement enabled="yes" id="616427" Application.name: Monitors
Application.description: It demonstrates different type of monitors present in Audit and Aanlytics Services

BalancingItem.name: EmailMonitor
BalancingItem.description: EmailMonitor and EmailSend work together. EmailSend task will send an email and EmailMonitor task will print the email details to the log.
BalancingItem.XMLProcedure: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <procedure autoDownload="false" downloadIntermediate="false" name="/Monitors/EmailMonitor" primarydsv="" rpname="MailMonRP" scriptPath="null" type="dsrp" uuid="6009bea-16eacaeeadc-00ef7662b53dc0f0afa8e8adbe1fdfa3" writeToDatabase="false" zipResults="false"> <declarations> <parameters> <!-- Filename AS STRING --> <parameter displayname="Filename" enabled="yes" name="Filename" type="STRING"/> <!-- From AS STRING --> <parameter displayname="From" enabled="yes" name="From" type="STRING"/> <!-- Subject AS STRING --> <parameter displayname="Subject" enabled="yes" name="Subject" type="STRING"/> <!-- ReceivedDate AS STRING --> <parameter displayname="ReceivedDate" enabled="yes" name="ReceivedDate" type="STRING"/> </parameters> <fields comment=""/> <variables> <!-- RowStr AS STRING --> <variable enabled="yes" name="RowStr" type="STRING"/> </variables> <data_sources/> <options> <!-- DATE_FORMAT = M/D/YYYY --> <option displayvalue="M/D/YYYY" name="DATE_FORMAT" value=""/> <!-- NUMERIC_FORMAT = -#,###.## --> <option displayvalue="-#,###.##" name="NUMERIC_FORMAT" value=""/> <!-- FILE_ENCODING = UTF-8 --> <option displayvalue="UTF-8" name="FILE_ENCODING" value="UTF-8"/> <!-- GENLEVEL = APPLICATION --> <option displayvalue="APPLICATION" name="GENLEVEL" value="APPLICATION"/> <!-- NO_VALUE = ERROR --> <option displayvalue="ERROR" name="NO_VALUE" value="ERROR"/> </options> </declarations> <cases> <!-- ON_START REPORT --> <case id="100194" name="report" type="start"> <block> <!-- RowStr = "Filename: " + Filename + " From: " + From + " Subject: " + Subject + " Received Date: " + ReceivedDate --> <statement enabled="yes" id="4131136" type="assignment"> <var name="RowStr">"Filename: " + Filename + " From: " + From + " Subject: " + Subject + " Received Date: " + ReceivedDate</var> </statement> <!-- PRINTLOG ( RowStr ) --> <statement enabled="yes" id="4131137" type="printlog"> <printlog>RowStr</printlog> </statement> </block> </case> <!-- ON_EACH RECORD --> <case id="100196" name="record" type="each"> <block/> </case> <!-- ON_END REPORT --> <case id="100195" name="report" BalancingItem.name: FileMonitor
BalancingItem.description: This demo explains about File Monitor Rule procedure, which is used to monitor specified directories. This rule procedure processes the arrived files as an input data source. When processing is complete, rule procedure can leave the file intact, move the processed file to another directory, or delete the file based on the configuration provided.

Application.name: GDPR_Sample_App
Application.description: This application explains how Audit and Analytics Services can explore, redact or export personal information for a person identified by the request from an External Database. Redaction is performed on sensitive information such as SSN and bank account number.

                    <!-- TmpDelete AS ASCII file -->
                    <data_source dsdname="ASCII files" enabled="yes" is_auto_download="false" is_input="false" is_output="false" name="TmpDelete" type="DSV">

                    <definitionphysical><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
                    <dataprovider is_auto_download="false" is_input="false" is_output="false" name="ASCII files">
                    <common>
                    <fields>
                    <field name="fld" order="1" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    </fields>
                    </common>
                    <specific>
                    <file name="" overwrite="true"/>
                    <tolerance converting_option="0" log_entry="true" name="" use_err_file="false">
                    <skip_line>#</skip_line>
                    <skip_line>&amp;&amp;</skip_line>
                    </tolerance>
                    <sorted>false</sorted>
                    <format delimiter="{tab}" escape="0" qualifier="{none}" type="Delimited" use_header="false"/>

                    </columns>

                    <RedactionRules/>
                    </redaction>
                    <definitioninfo>
                    <dataprovider name="ASCII files">
                    <common>
                    <fields>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="fld" order="1" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    </fields>
                    </common>
                    </dataprovider>
                    </definitioninfo>
                    </data_source>
                    </data_sources>
                    <options>
                    <!-- DATE_FORMAT  =  M/D/YYYY -->
                    <option displayvalue="M/D/YYYY" name="DATE_FORMAT" value=""/>
                    <!-- NUMERIC_FORMAT  =  -#,###.## -->
                    <option displayvalue="-#,###.##" name="NUMERIC_FORMAT" value=""/>
                    <!-- FILE_ENCODING  =  UTF-8 -->
                    <option displayvalue="UTF-8" name="FILE_ENCODING" value="UTF-8"/>
                    <!-- GENLEVEL  =  APPLICATION -->
                    <option displayvalue="APPLICATION" name="GENLEVEL" value="APPLICATION"/>
                    <!-- NO_VALUE  =  ERROR -->
                    <option displayvalue="ERROR" name="NO_VALUE" value="ERROR"/>
                    </options>
                    </declarations>
                    <cases>
                    <!-- ON_START REPORT -->
                    <case id="100220" name="report" type="start">
                    <block>
                    <!-- TransactionFilePar = "C:\\EmployeesDataFiles\\ReportExample.txt" -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4133025" type="assignment">
                    <var name="TransactionFilePar">"C:\\EmployeesDataFiles\\ReportExample.txt"</var>
                    </statement>
                    <!-- // RepositoryNamePar = "MobRepo" -->
                    <statement enabled="no" id="4133026" type="assignment">
                    <var name="RepositoryNamePar">"MobRepo"</var>
                    </statement>
                    <!-- // ReportID = "BANKSTMT2" -->
                    <statement enabled="no" id="4133027" type="assignment">
                    <var name="ReportID">"BANKSTMT2"</var>
                    </statement>
                    <!-- Bsearch = 0 -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4133028" type="assignment">
                    <var name="Bsearch">0</var>
                    </statement>
                    <!-- DELETE DeleteEmployeeSQL -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4133029" type="delete">
                    <target name="DeleteEmployeeSQL"/>
                    <where manual_query="false"/>
                    <conditionitems/>
                    </statement>
                    <!-- PRINTLOG  ( "Looking for employee " + EmployeeNamePar ) -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4133030" type="printlog">
                    <printlog>"Looking for employee " + EmployeeNamePar</printlog>
                    </statement>
                    <!-- IF UPPER(OperationPar) = "DELETE" -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4133031" type="condition">
                    <if>UPPER(OperationPar) = "DELETE"</if>
                    <conditionitems>
                    <conditionitem andor="" comparison="=" lexpression="UPPER(OperationPar)" lparen="" not="" rexpression=""DELETE"" rparen=""/>
                    </conditionitems>
                    <then>
                    <block>
                    <!-- DeletePar = 1 -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4133032" type="assignment">
                    <var name="DeletePar">1</var>
                    </statement>
                    <!-- PRINTLOG  ( "Employee data will be deleted" ) -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4133033" type="printlog">
                    <printlog>"Employee data will be deleted"</printlog>
                    </statement>
                    </block>
                    </then>
                    <else>
                    <block>
                    <!-- IF UPPER(OperationPar) = "REDACT" -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4133034" type="condition">
                    <if>UPPER(OperationPar) = "REDACT"</if>
                    <conditionitems>
                    <conditionitem andor="" comparison="=" lexpression="UPPER(OperationPar)" lparen="" not="" rexpression=""REDACT"" rparen=""/>
                    </conditionitems>
                    <then>
                    <block>
                    <!-- DeletePar = 2 -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4133035" type="assignment">
                    <var name="DeletePar">2</var>
                    </statement>
                    <!-- PRINTLOG  ( "Employee data will be redacted" ) -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4133036" type="printlog">
                    <printlog>"Employee data will be redacted"</printlog>
                    </statement>
                    </block>
                    </then>
                    <else>
                    <block>
                    <!-- IF UPPER(OperationPar) = "EXPORT" -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4133037" type="condition">
                    <if>UPPER(OperationPar) = "EXPORT"</if>
                    <conditionitems>
                    <conditionitem andor="" comparison="=" lexpression="UPPER(OperationPar)" lparen="" not="" rexpression=""EXPORT"" rparen=""/>
                    </conditionitems>
                    <then>
                    <block>
                    <!-- DeletePar = 3 -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4133038" type="assignment">
                    <var name="DeletePar">3</var>
                    </statement>
                    <!-- PRINTLOG  ( "Employee data will be exported" ) -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4133039" type="printlog">
                    <printlog>"Employee data will be exported"</printlog>
                    </statement>
                    </block>
                    </then>
                    <else>
                    <block>
                    <!-- IF UPPER(OperationPar) = "EXPLORE" -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4133040" type="condition">
                    <if>UPPER(OperationPar) = "EXPLORE"</if>
                    <conditionitems>
                    <conditionitem andor="" comparison="=" lexpression="UPPER(OperationPar)" lparen="" not="" rexpression=""EXPLORE"" rparen=""/>
                    </conditionitems>
                    <then>
                    <block>
                    <!-- DeletePar = 4 -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4133041" type="assignment">
                    <var name="DeletePar">4</var>
                    </statement>
                    </block>
                    </then>
                    <else>
                    <block>
                    <!-- RETURN EXCEPTION , "Operation can be one of: delete, redact, export, explore" , Rejected -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4133042" type="return">
                    <return code="8" error_message=""Operation can be one of: delete, redact, export, explore"" status="2"/>
                    </statement>
                    </block>
                    </else>
                    </statement>
                    </block>
                    </else>
                    </statement>
                    </block>
                    </else>
                    </statement>
                    </block>
                    </else>
                    </statement>
                    </block>
                    </case>
                    <!-- ON_START EMPLOYEEID -->
                    <case field="EMPLOYEEID" id="100223" name="field" type="start">
                    <block/>
                    </case>
                    <!-- ON_EACH RECORD -->
                    <case id="100222" name="record" type="each">
                    <block>
                    <!-- IF TRIM( EMPNAME) = TRIM(EmployeeNamePar) -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4133043" type="condition">
                    <if>TRIM( EMPNAME) = TRIM(EmployeeNamePar)</if>
                    <conditionitems>
                    <conditionitem andor="" comparison="=" lexpression="TRIM( EMPNAME)" lparen="" not="" rexpression="TRIM(EmployeeNamePar)" rparen=""/>
                    </conditionitems>
                    <then>
                    <block>
                    <!-- IF DeletePar = 2 -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4133044" type="condition">
                    <if>DeletePar = 2</if>
                    <conditionitems>
                    <conditionitem andor="" comparison="=" lexpression="DeletePar" lparen="" not="" rexpression="2" rparen=""/>
                    </conditionitems>
                    <then>
                    <block>
                    <!-- WRITE  ( EmployeesEdited  , EMPLOYEEID , EMPNAME , "XXX-XX-XXXX" , EMPSTATE , EMPCITY , EMPADDRESS , EMPEMAIL ) -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4133045" type="write">
                    <DSV>EmployeesEdited</DSV>
                    <writeparameters>
                    <writeparameter>EMPLOYEEID</writeparameter>
                    <writeparameter>EMPNAME</writeparameter>
                    <writeparameter>"XXX-XX-XXXX"</writeparameter>
                    <writeparameter>EMPSTATE</writeparameter>
                    <writeparameter>EMPCITY</writeparameter>
                    <writeparameter>EMPADDRESS</writeparameter>
                    <writeparameter>EMPEMAIL</writeparameter>
                    </writeparameters>
                    </statement>
                    <!-- PRINTLOG  ( "Redacted employee SSN in database" ) -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4133046" type="printlog">
                    <printlog>"Redacted employee SSN in database"</printlog>
                    </statement>
                    </block>
                    </then>
                    <else>
                    <block>
                    <!-- IF DeletePar = 3 -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4133047" type="condition">
                    <if>DeletePar = 3</if>
                    <conditionitems>
                    <conditionitem andor="" comparison="=" lexpression="DeletePar" lparen="" not="" rexpression="3" rparen=""/>
                    </conditionitems>
                    <then>
                    <block>
                    <!-- WRITE  ( EmployeesDataOut  , FORMAT( EMPLOYEEID, "#") , EMPNAME , EMPSSN , EMPSTATE , EMPCITY , EMPADDRESS , EMPEMAIL ) -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4133048" type="write">
                    <DSV>EmployeesDataOut</DSV>
                    <writeparameters>
                    <writeparameter>FORMAT( EMPLOYEEID, "#")</writeparameter>
                    <writeparameter>EMPNAME</writeparameter>
                    <writeparameter>EMPSSN</writeparameter>
                    <writeparameter>EMPSTATE</writeparameter>
                    <writeparameter>EMPCITY</writeparameter>
                    <writeparameter>EMPADDRESS</writeparameter>
                    <writeparameter>EMPEMAIL</writeparameter>
                    </writeparameters>
                    </statement>
                    <!-- PRINTLOG  ( "Exported employee record to " + FILENAME(EmployeesDataOut) ) -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4133049" type="printlog">
                    <printlog>"Exported employee record to " + FILENAME(EmployeesDataOut)</printlog>
                    </statement>
                    </block>
                    </then>
                    <else>
                    <block>
                    <!-- IF DeletePar = 1 -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4133050" type="condition">
                    <if>DeletePar = 1</if>
                    <conditionitems>
                    <conditionitem andor="" comparison="=" lexpression="DeletePar" lparen="" not="" rexpression="1" rparen=""/>
                    </conditionitems>
                    <then>
                    <block>
                    <!-- DeleteEmployeeDB = "select 1 as fld;delete from EMPLOYEES where  EMPLOYEEID =" + FORMAT( EMPLOYEEID, "#") + "" , NO_VALUE = ERROR , XSL = -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4133051" type="dsvinit">
                    <target filenameoption="0" intervaltype="4" name="DeleteEmployeeDB" novalexception="yes" policyname="" relativeinterval="0" reportid="" roottag="" rowtag="" sparkfile="" versionmode="0">"select 1 as fld;delete from EMPLOYEES where  EMPLOYEEID =" + FORMAT( EMPLOYEEID, "#") + ""</target>
                    <esavitem/>
                    </statement>
                    <!-- TmpDelete = System.getProperty("java.io.tmpdir") + "\\deleted.txt" , NO_VALUE = ERROR , XSL = -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4133052" type="dsvinit">
                    <target filenameoption="0" intervaltype="4" name="TmpDelete" novalexception="yes" policyname="" relativeinterval="0" reportid="" roottag="" rowtag="" sparkfile="" versionmode="0">System.getProperty("java.io.tmpdir") + "\\deleted.txt"</target>
                    <esavitem/>
                    <retrieveoptions>
                    <retrieveoption name="NO_VALUE" value="ERROR"/>
                    </retrieveoptions>
                    </statement>
                    <!-- SAVE DeleteEmployeeDB IN TmpDelete OVERWRITE -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4133053" type="save" usedatabase="no">
                    <target name="TmpDelete"/>
                    <dsvitem dsvname="DeleteEmployeeDB"/>
                    <overwrite value="yes"/>
                    </statement>
                    <!-- DELETE TmpDelete -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4133054" type="delete">
                    <target name="TmpDelete"/>
                    <where manual_query="false"/>
                    <conditionitems/>
                    </statement>
                    <!-- PRINTLOG  ( "Deleted employee record from database" ) -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4133055" type="printlog">
                    <printlog>"Deleted employee record from database"</printlog>
                    </statement>
                    </block>
                    </then>
                    <else/>
                    </statement>
                    </block>
                    </else>
                    </statement>
                    </block>
                    </else>
                    </statement>
                    <!-- Bsearch = Bsearch + 1 -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4133056" type="assignment">
                    <var name="Bsearch">Bsearch + 1</var>
                    </statement>
                    <!-- EmployeeIDsearch = FORMAT( EMPLOYEEID, "#") -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4133057" type="assignment">
                    <var name="EmployeeIDsearch">FORMAT( EMPLOYEEID, "#")</var>
                    </statement>
                    </block>
                    </then>
                    <else/>
                    </statement>
                    </block>
                    </case>
                    <!-- ON_END EMPLOYEEID -->
                    <case field="EMPLOYEEID" id="100224" name="field" type="end">
                    <block/>
                    </case>
                    <!-- ON_END REPORT -->
                    <case id="100221" name="report" type="end">
                    <block>
                    <!-- IF DeletePar = 3 -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4133058" type="condition">
                    <if>DeletePar = 3</if>
                    <conditionitems>
                    <conditionitem andor="" comparison="=" lexpression="DeletePar" lparen="" not="" rexpression="3" rparen=""/>
                    </conditionitems>
                    <then>
                    <block>
                    <!-- // DownloadedFiles = DOWNLOAD_REPORT(RepositoryNamePar, ReportID, "LAST", "C:\\EmployeesDataFiles\\BANKSTMT", 1) -->
                    <statement enabled="no" id="4133059" type="assignment">
                    <var name="DownloadedFiles">DOWNLOAD_REPORT(RepositoryNamePar, ReportID, "LAST", "C:\\EmployeesDataFiles\\BANKSTMT", 1)</var>
                    </statement>
                    </block>
                    </then>
                    <else/>
                    </statement>
                    <!-- EmpDataOutFile = FILENAME(EmployeesDataOut) -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4133060" type="assignment">
                    <var name="EmpDataOutFile">FILENAME(EmployeesDataOut)</var>
                    </statement>
                    <!-- CLOSE EmployeesDataOut -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4133061" type="close">
                    <target name="EmployeesDataOut"/>
                    </statement>
                    <!-- NumVar = (new java.io.File(EmpDataOutFile + ".dsd").delete() ? 1 : 0) -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4133062" type="assignment">
                    <var name="NumVar">(new java.io.File(EmpDataOutFile + ".dsd").delete() ? 1 : 0)</var>
                    </statement>
                    <!-- // WRITE  ( DBReport  , 1 , "Repository Name" , RepositoryNamePar ) -->
                    <statement enabled="no" id="4133063" type="write">
                    <DSV>DBReport</DSV>
                    <writeparameters>
                    <writeparameter>1</writeparameter>
                    <writeparameter>"Repository Name"</writeparameter>
                    <writeparameter>RepositoryNamePar</writeparameter>
                    </writeparameters>
                    </statement>
                    <!-- WRITE  ( DBReport  , 1 , "Employee records table" , "Employees" ) -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4133064" type="write">
                    <DSV>DBReport</DSV>
                    <writeparameters>
                    <writeparameter>1</writeparameter>
                    <writeparameter>"Employee records table"</writeparameter>
                    <writeparameter>"Employees"</writeparameter>
                    </writeparameters>
                    </statement>
                    <!-- WRITE  ( DBReport  , 1 , "Transaction File" , TransactionFilePar ) -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4133065" type="write">
                    <DSV>DBReport</DSV>
                    <writeparameters>
                    <writeparameter>1</writeparameter>
                    <writeparameter>"Transaction File"</writeparameter>
                    <writeparameter>TransactionFilePar</writeparameter>
                    </writeparameters>
                    </statement>
                    <!-- TransactionFileDate = new java.text.SimpleDateFormat("MM/dd/yyyy hh:mm:ss a").format(new java.util.Date(new java.io.File(TransactionFilePar).lastModified())) -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4133066" type="assignment">
                    <var name="TransactionFileDate">new java.text.SimpleDateFormat("MM/dd/yyyy hh:mm:ss a").format(new java.util.Date(new java.io.File(TransactionFilePar).lastModified()))</var>
                    </statement>
                    <!-- WRITE  ( DBReport  , 1 , "Transaction File Last Modification" , TransactionFileDate ) -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4133067" type="write">
                    <DSV>DBReport</DSV>
                    <writeparameters>
                    <writeparameter>1</writeparameter>
                    <writeparameter>"Transaction File Last Modification"</writeparameter>
                    <writeparameter>TransactionFileDate</writeparameter>
                    </writeparameters>
                    </statement>
                    <!-- WRITE  ( DBReport  , 2 , "Employee Name" , EmployeeNamePar ) -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4133068" type="write">
                    <DSV>DBReport</DSV>
                    <writeparameters>
                    <writeparameter>2</writeparameter>
                    <writeparameter>"Employee Name"</writeparameter>
                    <writeparameter>EmployeeNamePar</writeparameter>
                    </writeparameters>
                    </statement>
                    <!-- IF DeletePar = 1 -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4133069" type="condition">
                    <if>DeletePar = 1</if>
                    <conditionitems>
                    <conditionitem andor="" comparison="=" lexpression="DeletePar" lparen="" not="" rexpression="1" rparen=""/>
                    </conditionitems>
                    <then>
                    <block>
                    <!-- StrMode = "Deletion" -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4133070" type="assignment">
                    <var name="StrMode">"Deletion"</var>
                    </statement>
                    <!-- StrOper = "deleted" -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4133071" type="assignment">
                    <var name="StrOper">"deleted"</var>
                    </statement>
                    </block>
                    </then>
                    <else>
                    <block>
                    <!-- IF DeletePar = 2 -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4133072" type="condition">
                    <if>DeletePar = 2</if>
                    <conditionitems>
                    <conditionitem andor="" comparison="=" lexpression="DeletePar" lparen="" not="" rexpression="2" rparen=""/>
                    </conditionitems>
                    <then>
                    <block>
                    <!-- StrMode = "Redaction" -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4133073" type="assignment">
                    <var name="StrMode">"Redaction"</var>
                    </statement>
                    <!-- StrOper = "redacted" -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4133074" type="assignment">
                    <var name="StrOper">"redacted"</var>
                    </statement>
                    </block>
                    </then>
                    <else>
                    <block>
                    <!-- IF DeletePar = 3 -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4133075" type="condition">
                    <if>DeletePar = 3</if>
                    <conditionitems>
                    <conditionitem andor="" comparison="=" lexpression="DeletePar" lparen="" not="" rexpression="3" rparen=""/>
                    </conditionitems>
                    <then>
                    <block>
                    <!-- StrMode = "Export" -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4133076" type="assignment">
                    <var name="StrMode">"Export"</var>
                    </statement>
                    <!-- StrOper = "exported" -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4133077" type="assignment">
                    <var name="StrOper">"exported"</var>
                    </statement>
                    </block>
                    </then>
                    <else>
                    <block>
                    <!-- StrMode = "Explore" -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4133078" type="assignment">
                    <var name="StrMode">"Explore"</var>
                    </statement>
                    <!-- StrOper = "found" -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4133079" type="assignment">
                    <var name="StrOper">"found"</var>
                    </statement>
                    </block>
                    </else>
                    </statement>
                    </block>
                    </else>
                    </statement>
                    </block>
                    </else>
                    </statement>
                    <!-- WRITE  ( DBReport  , 2 , "Mode" , StrMode ) -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4133080" type="write">
                    <DSV>DBReport</DSV>
                    <writeparameters>
                    <writeparameter>2</writeparameter>
                    <writeparameter>"Mode"</writeparameter>
                    <writeparameter>StrMode</writeparameter>
                    </writeparameters>
                    </statement>
                    <!-- WRITE  ( DBReport  , 2 , "Run requested by user" , com.mobius.abs.dal.DALAccessorFactory.getInstance().getUser().getLoginName() ) -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4133081" type="write">
                    <DSV>DBReport</DSV>
                    <writeparameters>
                    <writeparameter>2</writeparameter>
                    <writeparameter>"Run requested by user"</writeparameter>
                    <writeparameter>com.mobius.abs.dal.DALAccessorFactory.getInstance().getUser().getLoginName()</writeparameter>
                    </writeparameters>
                    </statement>
                    <!-- IF Bsearch <> 0 -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4133082" type="condition">
                    <if>Bsearch <> 0</if>
                    <conditionitems>
                    <conditionitem andor="" comparison="<>" lexpression="Bsearch" lparen="" not="" rexpression="0" rparen=""/>
                    </conditionitems>
                    <then>
                    <block>
                    <!-- WRITE  ( DBReport  , 3 , "Found in data source" , "\"Employee records\"" ) -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4133083" type="write">
                    <DSV>DBReport</DSV>
                    <writeparameters>
                    <writeparameter>3</writeparameter>
                    <writeparameter>"Found in data source"</writeparameter>
                    <writeparameter>"\"Employee records\""</writeparameter>
                    </writeparameters>
                    </statement>
                    <!-- WRITE  ( DBReport  , 3 , "      Number of " + StrOper + " records" , FORMAT(Bsearch, "#") ) -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4133084" type="write">
                    <DSV>DBReport</DSV>
                    <writeparameters>
                    <writeparameter>3</writeparameter>
                    <writeparameter>"      Number of " + StrOper + " records"</writeparameter>
                    <writeparameter>FORMAT(Bsearch, "#")</writeparameter>
                    </writeparameters>
                    </statement>
                    <!-- PRINTLOG  ( "Found " +  FORMAT( Bsearch, "#") + " row(s) for " +  EmployeeNamePar + " in the database, table name Employees" ) -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4133085" type="printlog">
                    <printlog>"Found " +  FORMAT( Bsearch, "#") + " row(s) for " +  EmployeeNamePar + " in the database, table name Employees"</printlog>
                    </statement>
                    <!-- CALL GDPR_Sample_Transactions  ( EmployeeIDsearch, DeletePar, TransactionFilePar ) -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4133086" type="call">
                    <call name="GDPR_Sample_Transactions">
                    <parameters>
                    <parameter formalname="EmployeeID" name="EmployeeIDsearch"/>
                    <parameter formalname="DeletePar" name="DeletePar"/>
                    <parameter formalname="ReportPathPar" name="TransactionFilePar"/>
                    </parameters>
                    </call>
                    </statement>
                    <!-- IF NumTransactions = 0 -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4133087" type="condition">
                    <if>NumTransactions = 0</if>
                    <conditionitems>
                    <conditionitem andor="" comparison="=" lexpression="NumTransactions" lparen="" not="" rexpression="0" rparen=""/>
                    </conditionitems>
                    <then>
                    <block>
                    <!-- RETURN SUCCESS , "No transactions found" , Pending -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4133088" type="return">
                    <return code="0" error_message=""No transactions found"" status="3"/>
                    </statement>
                    </block>
                    </then>
                    <else>
                    <block>
                    <!-- WRITE  ( DBReport  , 3 , "Found in data source" , "\"transactions\"" ) -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4133089" type="write">
                    <DSV>DBReport</DSV>
                    <writeparameters>
                    <writeparameter>3</writeparameter>
                    <writeparameter>"Found in data source"</writeparameter>
                    <writeparameter>"\"transactions\""</writeparameter>
                    </writeparameters>
                    </statement>
                    <!-- WRITE  ( DBReport  , 3 , "      Number of " + StrOper + " records" , FORMAT(NumTransactions, "#") ) -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4133090" type="write">
                    <DSV>DBReport</DSV>
                    <writeparameters>
                    <writeparameter>3</writeparameter>
                    <writeparameter>"      Number of " + StrOper + " records"</writeparameter>
                    <writeparameter>FORMAT(NumTransactions, "#")</writeparameter>
                    </writeparameters>
                    </statement>
                    <!-- // WRITE  ( DBReport  , 3 , "Found in data source" , "\"Mobius Repository\", ReportID \"BANKSTMT\"" ) -->
                    <statement enabled="no" id="4133091" type="write">
                    <DSV>DBReport</DSV>
                    <writeparameters>
                    <writeparameter>3</writeparameter>
                    <writeparameter>"Found in data source"</writeparameter>
                    <writeparameter>"\"Mobius Repository\", ReportID \"BANKSTMT\""</writeparameter>
                    </writeparameters>
                    </statement>
                    <!-- // WRITE  ( DBReport  , 3 , "      Number of " + StrOper + " statements" , FORMAT(Bsearch, "#") ) -->
                    <statement enabled="no" id="4133092" type="write">
                    <DSV>DBReport</DSV>
                    <writeparameters>
                    <writeparameter>3</writeparameter>
                    <writeparameter>"      Number of " + StrOper + " statements"</writeparameter>
                    <writeparameter>FORMAT(Bsearch, "#")</writeparameter>
                    </writeparameters>
                    </statement>
                    <!-- // PRINTLOG  ( "Looking for account statements for " +  EmployeeNamePar + " in Mobius Repository" ) -->
                    <statement enabled="no" id="4133093" type="printlog">
                    <printlog>"Looking for account statements for " +  EmployeeNamePar + " in Mobius Repository"</printlog>
                    </statement>
                    <!-- // IF DeletePar = 4 -->
                    <statement enabled="no" id="4133094" type="condition">
                    <if>DeletePar = 4</if>
                    <conditionitems>
                    <conditionitem andor="" comparison="=" lexpression="DeletePar" lparen="" not="" rexpression="4" rparen=""/>
                    </conditionitems>
                    <then>
                    <block>
                    <!-- // PRINTLOG  ( "Found " + FORMAT( Bsearch, "#") + " account statements for " +  EmployeeNamePar + " in Mobius Repository " +  RepositoryNamePar + ", Report ID \"BANKSTMT\"" ) -->
                    <statement enabled="no" id="4133095" type="printlog">
                    <printlog>"Found " + FORMAT( Bsearch, "#") + " account statements for " +  EmployeeNamePar + " in Mobius Repository " +  RepositoryNamePar + ", Report ID \"BANKSTMT\""</printlog>
                    </statement>
                    </block>
                    </then>
                    <else>
                    <block>
                    <!-- // PRINTLOG  ( "Found and " + StrOper + " "  + FORMAT( Bsearch, "#") + " account statements for " +  EmployeeNamePar + " in Mobius Repository " +  RepositoryNamePar + ", Report ID \"BANKSTMT\"" ) -->
                    <statement enabled="no" id="4133096" type="printlog">
                    <printlog>"Found and " + StrOper + " "  + FORMAT( Bsearch, "#") + " account statements for " +  EmployeeNamePar + " in Mobius Repository " +  RepositoryNamePar + ", Report ID \"BANKSTMT\""</printlog>
                    </statement>
                    </block>
                    </else>
                    </statement>
                    <!-- RETURN SUCCESS , "Data manipulation succeeded" , Pending -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4133097" type="return">
                    <return code="0" error_message=""Data manipulation succeeded"" status="3"/>
                    </statement>
                    </block>
                    </else>
                    </statement>
                    </block>
                    </then>
                    <else>
                    <block>
                    <!-- RETURN EXCEPTION , "Employee not found" , Rejected -->
                    <statement enabled="yes" id="4133098" type="return">
                    <return code="8" error_message=""Employee not found"" status="2"/>
                    </statement>
                    </block>
                    </else>
                    </statement>
                    </block>
                    </case>
                    </cases>
                    </procedure>

BalancingItem.name: AC001_Excel
BalancingItem.description: It demonstrates the Excel reporting functionality of Audit and Analytics Services
BalancingItem.XMLProcedure:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
                    <procedure autoDownload="false" downloadIntermediate="false" name="/ExcelReportingDemo/AC001_Excel" primarydsv="AC001" rpname="ExcelReportDemoRP" scriptPath="null" type="dsrp" uuid="6009bea-16eacaeef1e-00ef7662b53dc0f0afa8e8adbe1fdfa3" writeToDatabase="false" zipResults="false">
                    <declarations>
                    <parameters/>
                    <fields>
                    <!-- Report_ID AS STRING -->
                    <field level="1" name="Report_ID" type="STRING"/>
                    <!-- Effective_Date AS DATE -->
                    <field level="1" name="Effective_Date" type="DATE"/>
                    <!-- Dept AS STRING -->
                    <field level="1" name="Dept" type="STRING"/>
                    <!-- Region AS STRING -->
                    <field level="1" name="Region" type="STRING"/>
                    <!-- Office AS STRING -->
                    <field level="1" name="Office" type="STRING"/>
                    <!-- ACCT_CODE AS NUMERIC -->
                    <field level="1" name="ACCT_CODE" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    <!-- ACCT_DESC AS STRING -->
                    <field level="1" name="ACCT_DESC" type="STRING"/>
                    <!-- PLANNED_MTD AS NUMERIC -->
                    <field level="1" name="PLANNED_MTD" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    <!-- ACTUAL_MTD AS NUMERIC -->
                    <field level="1" name="ACTUAL_MTD" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    </fields>
                    <variables/>
                    <data_sources>
                    <!-- Excel AS Excel reporting (Write) -->
                    <data_source dsdname="Excel reporting (writable)" enabled="yes" is_auto_download="false" is_input="false" is_output="false" name="Excel" type="DSV">
                    <definition><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
                    <dataprovider name="">
                    <common>
                    <fields>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="ACTUAL_MTD" order="8" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="PLANNED_MTD" order="7" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="ACCT_DESC" order="6" type="STRING"/>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="ACCT_CODE" order="5" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="Office" order="4" type="STRING"/>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="Region" order="3" type="STRING"/>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="Dept" order="2" type="STRING"/>
                    <field isenabled="1" iskey="0" isvisible="1" name="Effective_Date" order="1" type="DATE"/>
                    </fields>
                    </common>
                    </dataprovider>
                    </definition>
                    <definitionphysical><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
                    <dataprovider is_auto_download="false" is_input="false" is_output="false" name="Excel reporting (writable)">
                    <common>
                    <fields>
                    <field data_format="&lt;?xml version=&quot;1.0&quot; encoding=&quot;UTF-8&quot; standalone=&quot;no&quot;?&gt;&#13;&#10;&lt;format&gt;&#13;&#10;&lt;format_type&gt;NUMERIC&lt;/format_type&gt;&#13;&#10;&lt;pattern&gt;-#,###&lt;/pattern&gt;&#13;&#10;&lt;digit_grouping&gt;#,###.##&lt;/digit_grouping&gt;&#13;&#10;&lt;allow_decimal_point&gt;false&lt;/allow_decimal_point&gt;&#13;&#10;&lt;allow_currency&gt;false&lt;/allow_currency&gt;&#13;&#10;&lt;currency_symbol&gt;$&lt;/currency_symbol&gt;&#13;&#10;&lt;/format&gt;&#13;&#10;" name="ACTUAL_MTD" order="8" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    <field data_format="&lt;?xml version=&quot;1.0&quot; encoding=&quot;UTF-8&quot; standalone=&quot;no&quot;?&gt;&#13;&#10;&lt;format&gt;&#13;&#10;&lt;format_type&gt;NUMERIC&lt;/format_type&gt;&#13;&#10;&lt;pattern&gt;-#,###&lt;/pattern&gt;&#13;&#10;&lt;digit_grouping&gt;#,###.##&lt;/digit_grouping&gt;&#13;&#10;&lt;allow_decimal_point&gt;false&lt;/allow_decimal_point&gt;&#13;&#10;&lt;allow_currency&gt;false&lt;/allow_currency&gt;&#13;&#10;&lt;currency_symbol&gt;$&lt;/currency_symbol&gt;&#13;&#10;&lt;/format&gt;&#13;&#10;" name="PLANNED_MTD" order="7" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    <field name="ACCT_DESC" order="6" type="STRING"/>
                    <field data_format="&lt;?xml version=&quot;1.0&quot; encoding=&quot;UTF-8&quot; standalone=&quot;no&quot;?&gt;&#13;&#10;&lt;format&gt;&#13;&#10;&lt;format_type&gt;NUMERIC&lt;/format_type&gt;&#13;&#10;&lt;pattern&gt;-#,###&lt;/pattern&gt;&#13;&#10;&lt;digit_grouping&gt;#,###.##&lt;/digit_grouping&gt;&#13;&#10;&lt;allow_decimal_point&gt;false&lt;/allow_decimal_point&gt;&#13;&#10;&lt;allow_currency&gt;false&lt;/allow_currency&gt;&#13;&#10;&lt;currency_symbol&gt;$&lt;/currency_symbol&gt;&#13;&#10;&lt;/format&gt;&#13;&#10;" name="ACCT_CODE" order="5" type="NUMERIC"/>
                    <field name="Office" order="4" type="STRING"/>
                    <field name="Region" order="3" type="STRING"/>
                    <field name="Dept" order="2" type="STRING"/>
                    <field data_format="&lt;?xml version=&quot;1.0&quot; encoding=&quot;UTF-8&quot; standalone=&quot;no&quot;?&gt;&#13;&#10;&lt;format&gt;&#13;&#10;&lt;format_type&gt;DATE&lt;/format_type&gt;&#13;&#10;&lt;pattern&gt;MM/DD/YY&lt;/pattern&gt;&#13;&#10;&lt;date_order&gt;MDY&lt;/date_order&gt;&#13;&#10;&lt;date_delimiter&gt;/&lt;/date_delimiter&gt;&#13;&#10;&lt;four_digit_years&gt;false&lt;/four_digit_years&gt;&#13;&#10;&lt;lead_zeros_days&gt;true&lt;/lead_zeros_days&gt;&#13;&#10;&lt;/format&gt;&#13;&#10;" name="Effective_Date" order="1" type="DATE"/>
